story:
What is Tandala?
Tandala Ranch and Eco Farm is a ranch and resort built on one
fundamental principle; the environment. Built in the style of the
traditional African huts and villages we make use of everything this
land has to offer. All the straw-roofed lodges are built with stone
walls gathered from quarries in the area and the roofs are supported by
wood from local trees. We planted and replanted several trees, shrubs,
plants and flowers to accommodate the layout of our ranch. So, basically
we moved things around and have interfered with nature as little as
possible. The vegetables and fruit we grow and the livestock on the
ranch are used solely for consumption for those who live on or visit
Tandala. Excess production of fruit and vegetables is donated to local
schools or projects. Also, our staff is hired from the local villages
so we assist the economic growth of the area as well.
We are not connected to the Kenyan power grid, we use solar power
exclusively; for our restaurant and reception, for the lodges and for
the outdoor lights around the ranch. The water we use is pumped either
from the river or our hand dug wells and filtered, so it can be used
for irrigation and of course to make sure our guests can have a hot
shower after a long dusty day on safari. Drinking water is available in
bottles in the lodges and of course our restaurant only uses bottled
water for the preparation of meals.

Where is Tandala?
Tandala Ranch lies at the foot of Mount Kenya, near the village of Jua
Kali (which means 'strong sun'). The nearest city is called Nanyuki and
is 15 kilometers from Tandala. Our ranch is perfectly situated for
those interested in safari; Ol Pajeta conservancy is only a 15 minute
drive from Tandala and Mpala Wildlife Conservancy can be reached within
30 minutes.The Ol Daiga Hills farm is another good option to see
wildlife.

Is Tandala a place that I would want to visit?
In one word; absolutely. Whether you want to enjoy a safari and see the
Big 5, or if you like bird watching, hiking, biking or enjoy nature or
African culture. 
And maybe you simply want to enjoy a restful couple of days in a
beautiful environment away from busy city-life, work, smartphones or e
-mail. In that case Tandala is the place to go. 
However, if you enjoy mass tourism Tandala may not be the best
destination for you.

What have you built so far?
Tandala Ranch currently consists of; 2 fully functional lodges (hot
shower and toilet, queen-size bed), a reception area, art gallery and relax area, a bar, a traditional grill restaurant, a riverside open air lunch grill and an outside bar overlooking both Mount Kenya and one of the smaller dams on the ranch. Tandala also has a vegetable and fruit garden of over 3 acres (potatoes, onions, garlic, broccoli, carrots, tomatoes, avocados,
bananas, mango's among others) and several livestock pens (goats, pigs, rabbits and chickens). We have dug three water wells to make use of the ground water and we have three pumps to pump water from the river and 4 storage tanks to hold the water until it is needed. We have installed solar panels on all the roofs of the existing buildings to provide electricity.
Also our staff lives on the ranch and they have their own traditional African style village consisting of four huts. Staff working in the vegetable garden have their own African style huts set between the banana trees.

What remains to be done?
First, for our Primary Goal ($50.000) we aim to complete the lodges so
that we have six fully operational lodges with a capacity of twelve
guests at any given time. Also, we want to add several huts to house our
additional staff.
Second, if we reach our Stretched Goal ($90.000) we want to obtain a
permanent water supply by digging several dams on various locations on
the ranch. The river which is currently used to irrigate the vegetable
garden and the plants and flowers on the ranch is running dry more
often and more quickly than in the past and without extra water
capacity we risk losing  part of our vegetation.
Third, if we reach our Super-stretched Goal ($130.000) we intend to
expand the irrigation system (which is currently very labor-intensive
and not as efficient as we would like) and replace the current water
pumps (powered with gasoline) with solar water pumps. In this way we
remain committed to keep Tandala as eco-friendly as possible.
Fourth, if we reach our Ultimate Goal ($170.000) we want to expand our
solar capacity by building a large solar array on top of the roof of
several buildings at the edge of the valley (and out of sight of our
guests). With this expansion we can guarantee electricity at all hours
everywhere on the ranch, so you can feel secure on the lit path to your
lodge, read a book in bed at night for hours and of course be assured of a cold beer after a hot day!


So, this is what we intend to do for the next couple of months. If you
are interested in helping eco-tourism along you are welcome to pledge any amount you like. If you intend to visit Kenya for safari in the future you may want to look at the perks that award free nights of stay in our lodges and give you free breakfast, lunch and diner for those days as well!
N.B.: Please note that with all perks on offer, drinks and alcohol are not
included. Also note that perks are for a lodge for 2 persons and 2
person meals! So basically you can imagine that our perks are in many
cases a pre-investment to your future holiday.
And best of all; even when we do not hit our target(s), the perks you
paid for are redeemable any time in the future anyway!
Just remember to contact us for availability and reservation details before you book your trip to Kenya. Tandala Ranch officially opens its doors on July 1st 2017.

N.B.: All perks expire at July 1st 2019.

You may want to look at our website http://www.tandala-birding-resort.com/en/  and view our photo gallery to have a look at Tandala Ranch and Eco Farm. 
It is nearly impossible to give you an idea of the beauty and serenity
of Tandala with only a couple of photos, but it will give you some idea what you can expect.
As one guest told us recently; "The photos on your website don't do
justice to the view I am looking at right now. If I had known it would
look like this, I would have come much sooner."

Ecotourism is booming in Kenya, but we feel confident that nowhere in
Kenya (nor in Africa for that matter) you will find a place quite like
Tandala.

Imagine a valley near the river, filled with a sea of several shades of
green from the treetops, occasionally interrupted by the bright colors
of orange, red, yellow and white of our beautiful flowers while at the
background you can admire the majesty of one of the highest snow capped mountains in the world. Imagine sitting by your campfire at night admiring the clear starlit sky. Then imagine that you can visit such a place and live for a few moments in a paradise with an authentic African
atmosphere, while enjoying the facilities, hospitality and quality of a modern resort.

Welcome to Tandala Ranch.

We have installed solar panels on all the roofs of the existing buildings to provide electricity.Also our staff lives on the ranch and they have their own traditional African style village consisting of four huts. Staff working in the vegetable garden have their own African style huts set between the banana trees.
What remains to be done?First, for our Primary Goal ($50.000) we aim to complete the lodges sothat we have six fully operational lodges with a capacity of twelveguests at any given time. Also, we want to add several huts to house ouradditional staff.Second, if we reach our Stretched Goal ($90.000) we want to obtain apermanent water supply by digging several dams on various locations onthe ranch. The river which is currently used to irrigate the vegetablegarden and the plants and flowers on the ranch is running dry moreoften and more quickly than in the past and without extra watercapacity we risk losing  part of our vegetation.Third, if we reach our Super-stretched Goal ($130.000) we intend toexpand the irrigation system (which is currently very labor-intensiveand not as efficient as we would like) and replace the current waterpumps (powered with gasoline) with solar water pumps. In this way weremain committed to keep Tandala as eco-friendly as possible.Fourth, if we reach our Ultimate Goal ($170.000) we want to expand oursolar capacity by building a large solar array on top of the roof ofseveral buildings at the edge of the valley (and out of sight of ourguests). With this expansion we can guarantee electricity at all hourseverywhere on the ranch, so you can feel secure on the lit path to yourlodge, read a book in bed at night for hours and of course be assured of a cold beer after a hot day!
So, this is what we intend to do for the next couple of months. If youare interested in helping eco-tourism along you are welcome to pledge any amount you like. If you intend to visit Kenya for safari in the future you may want to look at the perks that award free nights of stay in our lodges and give you free breakfast, lunch and diner for those days as well!N.B.: Please note that with all perks on offer, drinks and alcohol are notincluded. Also note that perks are for a lodge for 2 persons and 2person meals! So basically you can imagine that our perks are in manycases a pre-investment to your future holiday.And best of all; even when we do not hit our target(s), the perks youpaid for are redeemable any time in the future anyway!Just remember to contact us for availability and reservation details before you book your trip to Kenya. Tandala Ranch officially opens its doors on July 1st 2017.
N.B.: All perks expire at July 1st 2019.
You may want to look at our website http://www.tandala-birding-resort.com/en/  and view our photo gallery to have a look at Tandala Ranch and Eco Farm. It is nearly impossible to give you an idea of the beauty and serenityof Tandala with only a couple of photos, but it will give you some idea what you can expect.As one guest told us recently; "The photos on your website don't dojustice to the view I am looking at right now. If I had known it wouldlook like this, I would have come much sooner."
Ecotourism is booming in Kenya, but we feel confident that nowhere inKenya (nor in Africa for that matter) you will find a place quite likeTandala.
Imagine a valley near the river, filled with a sea of several shades ofgreen from the treetops, occasionally interrupted by the bright colorsof orange, red, yellow and white of our beautiful flowers while at thebackground you can admire the majesty of one of the highest snow capped mountains in the world. Imagine sitting by your campfire at night admiring the clear starlit sky. Then imagine that you can visit such a place and live for a few moments in a paradise with an authentic Africanatmosphere, while enjoying the facilities, hospitality and quality of a modern resort.
Welcome to Tandala Ranch.

story:
If you haven't heard about Mina Mizu via "The Media" here's what you missed:

Julia Taeko; Journalist for Women 2.0 summed up Omima M. Miki (the founder and developer of Mina Mizu) in an article published Dec 20th, 2016 that resonated with many people across the globe. 

From hosting and sponsoring educational competitions for students, serving on multiple committees within the American Chamber of Commerce Japan and working in the entrainment industry as an author/screenwriter, her past and current endeavors supporting local communities created an impressive track record inspiring many of the younger generation and gaining positive recognition from larger companies and influential individuals looking to support her endeavors. 

To all those reading, having the odds against her in Japan is fair to acknowledge (single parent, working mom, foreigner, young). However, she never claims any of those points to be a challenge, but the day to day dilemma of bearing her body art is another story!  Depending on where she is if the tattoo is visible it could be seen as unprofessional or untraditional. "When you're in a room and everyone is wearing business suits, you shouldn't be focused on each others "birthday suits and when you're at a public bath you shouldn't be focused on trying to identify someone's work background because they're not wearing a suit and sporting a tattoo." Miki states just before her interview with journalist Jake Adelstein of The Japan Times. 

Which brings us to now - 

During a television interview Miki lightly jokes, "When the doors of an onsen close, a new onsen opens—with much bigger doors!" 

Going to the beach, gym, hot springs is something that many people enjoy doing even in Japan and that includes people with tattoos. Mina Mizu Hot Springs will welcome anyone with a tattoo and anyone who appreciates the art form, but it’s also providing an objective history of the tattoo industry in Japan with an artistic, high-tech digital interior. It has an important, two-fold mission — to help Japanese and foreigners understand the history of tattoos, and normalize the image of tattoos in Japan.

Mina Mizu is set to launch during Golden Week of 2019 an appropriate timeframe with enough breathing room for the following year when Japan hosts the 2020 Olympic games.  

So what else makes this onsen different - 

Because this is a tattoo inspired onsen, Mina Mizu plans to honor and showcase a digital hands-on lounge/showroom appreciating of the art-form's past and present. After all tattoos are another way of telling a story, so why not tell the WHOLE HISTORY visually and beautifully!

Mina Mizu's designs will bring forth a unique high tech concept that now can be associated with water. One such example are MDH hologram technology that can illuminate out of the water as you're bathing designed by partnering company OneOverChaos; a design firm based out of Las Vegas/Hong Kong. Some might say that this is similar to an attraction, but for us it's a unique experience that allows guests to be "submerged" in the art form literally.

OneOverChaos have taken on the role to design and implement this stunning construct. Working with Mina Mizu to incorporate not only the traditional, gritty style of the underground tattoo world, but also modern accommodations. Besides the customary female and male onsens, the facility will also have a family (co-ed) swimming pool, as well as a 30-room ryokan, or Japanese style hotel, an Izikaya, Japanese style bar, and the previously mentioned showroom / lounge that will be designed to showcase the history of tattoos in Japan. 

The most exceptional part of the onsen is the Feng Shui architectural embellishments/installations of the interior and exterior décor—another tribute to highlight the significance of symbolism on the body. 

Where you come in -

It's not just enough to have the support of partnering companies. We need the support of communities who share these like-minded endeavors. In order to break down discriminating barriers for residences and foreigners, who love Japan and just want to enjoy one of the many perks japan has to offer, it's imperative to move forward together. 

Public support for stage one developments of this facility backs the following goals:

  • Giving entire families to spend quality time together instead of a member of the family sitting out because he/she has a tattoo. 
  • Relinquishes Tokyo's new "onsen rules" that allow people with tattoos so long as they can cover it with mummy-like bandages. (Which by the way, isn't realistic for body tattoos nor does it shame you any less)
  • Expand potential customer base and continue to make Japan as a whole a more attractive travel destination for tattooed tourists.

Public funding support for stage one developments of this facility backs the following:

  • ​Buying onsen property rights that is separate from buying land.
  • Stage two designs from associated architect firms and involved installation artists.

(Note: Stage one and two are imperative for the involvement of our partnered investors whom are supporting stage three and four - CONSTRUCTION and MARKETING! Thus, the support and excitement from the people only makes the process move along quickly~

Other Ways You Can Help

  • For those in the press/media if in the Tokyo area a large press conference will be held in late March 2017 at the Foreign Correspondence Club, please e-mail for details. We welcome everyone to come meet members of our strategy team as well as anyone gathering more information. 

 

  • By all means SHARE SHARE SHARE! Social media support is just as effective as financial backing. Our facility started and has received alot of buzz because of YOU! We're not the only people who want to see this facility come to fruition—many of you do too! 

 

  • We also encourage other types of partnerships, especially if you're in the industries of  technology, art or tattoo! Have some ideas for what you want seen in the showroom please share! Or come to the press conference and speak your ideas OUT LOUD! We want to hear from you!

Thank you everyone for visiting this page! Please support us and please stay involved!

Special thanks: Video by YOUTUBE channel "Taking on Japan".

story:
Short Summary

"Bevo Goes to Prague" is the title given to the Prague Quadrennial (PQ) 2015 project submitted by the Design and Production graduate students in the Department of Theatre and Dance. PQ is an event held every four years in Prague to celebrate and explore space in Performance Design on an international scale. Our students proposed a project to PQ for the "Tribes" section of the event. Through this project, each group is tasked with exploring the idea of what makes a "tribe" and designing, creating, and performing these ideas at PQ in June 2015. For our project, we looked directly to the source which inspired us. Bevo, the longhorn, has long been an emblem of the University and of Texas pride. We, as artists, wanted to explore the ideas of how fine arts students can identify as a longhorn and share in the university's long held prestige. This experience will be created by employing UT Austin traditions, and giving them a theatrical turn, including longhorn head masks, nods to the Torch Rally, and the ubiquitous "Eyes of Texas" anthem.


What We Need & What You Get

All funding received for this project will go directly into helping our students travel to Prague for the Quadrennial. All funding will be divided equally among the fifteen students who have been accepted to the event.

  • We are looking to raise $20,000 to help us travel to Prague for this amazing opportunity! 
  • All funds raised, will be divided amongst us evenly to help cover the out of pocket expenses that come with international travel.
  • Many of our team has never traveled internationally before, and you can provide them with the opportunity to experience other cultures and ideas!

The Impact

This project will give the unique educational opportunity for all of the students attending a chance to be seen on a international level, as well as the ability to create and see art from all around the world pertaining to the performing arts. This event will also increase the likelihood of our students networking and making international connections that can create working relationships through different countries and cultures.

  • This project is allowing us to not only network on a global scale, but to witness great art from theatrical artists that are internationally recognized.
  • While we are working on writing grants, applying for funding, and fellowships, the majority of our costs will be coming from our own pockets, making any and all funding from this IndieGogo page to be a huge weight of financial burden to be lifted off of our students backs.

Risks & Challenges

While we choose to work as though we have everything figured out, we know that the very real likelihood of us not achieving our fundraising efforts exists. Which could be a huge deterrant for several of our students and thus, diminishing our numbers to be able to represent our wonderful school and program in a truly staggering way. However, as theatre artists, we are more than aware that funding for the arts are being cut left and right, and we know that if we don't care about it, then no one will, so we are going to keep pushing forward and working to create.

  • Being theatre artists, we are used to having to solve problems in new and unique ways and to find methods around challenges that step in front of us. We are skilled in communication, teamwork, collaboration, and creative critical thinking, and are able to think on our feet to make quick decisions to achieve our end goals as a team.

  • We are looking to solve these challenges in a multitude of ways, including researching and writing grants, proposals to the department, college, and university at large.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone has tons of extra cash lying around, but remember every little bit helps. And if you can't make a contribution, please help us get the word out!

  • Many hands make light work! If you can't contribute please share this on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Instagram, snail mail, carrier pigeon, or however else! Just help us get the word out to all of your friends and families and let's see what we can do in the next 60 days!

  • Please feel free to use the share buttons on IG to make it even easier to share on all of your social networking!

story:
We, at the Lockee Project, want to thank you, our backers, for making the purchase of our unique and innovative product and to show our appreciation we are going to implement a new referral program to reward our backers for bringing more backers to the project.


Current backers are our strongest supporters, so we are offering this incentive to you. For the backers that purchase the Lockee using your unique Indiegogo user ID. This Indiegogo user ID acts as your referral code that will allow you to receive a 10% refund from your referral  purchase price. For each additional purchase made by someone using your link you will receive this refund. If you are able to get enough referrals you can get your Lockee or Lockees for free!!. The entire process is really very simple choose your perk, share your link, and get your Lockee for FREE!! Not convinced? Check out updates tab above for something even more catchy...



In 2014, the total number mishandled bags  by the airline industry was 26.2 million. Upon closer examination of the details they show that delayed bags comprised 81.2% of the total mishandled bags. Damaged or pilfered bags account for 15.5% of mishandled bags and 3.3% were declared lost or stolen. Mishandled bags cost the airline industry a total of $2.09 US billion in 2014, so reducing expenditure on mishandled bags would have a positive impact on the airline industry's bottom line and provide an improved customer experience.﻿

The Lockee is a unique and innovative "Smart Technology" product that provides the traveler with the ability to lock, track, and locate their luggage by securing the bag with the Lockee device and tracking it with an app on their Smartphone, but what differentiates the Lockee from similar products on the market is that once your lost or mishandled baggage is located Lockee, through a global partnership, will return your property within a 48 hour time frame.  



The Lockee is fully TSA compliant and accepted because we know that the world we live in today has many threats so security checks are an unavoidable part of and are absolutely necessary for our safety. In some countries, TSA’s standardized keys can securely unlock and re-lock travel locks on luggage pieces undergoing security checks. TSA agents are authorized to cut and dispose of any locks that can’t be unlocked using the TSA Master Keys. Remember the Lockee was designed with customer convenience in mind.




The Lockee is the prime example of a “Smart Technology” driven product designed to meet the needs of its customers. The Lockee uses SMs-GSM Networks to enhance its ability to act as a global tracking device that provides the user with state-of the-art locking, tracking, and location capabilities that are conveniently accessed by one’s ubiquitous Smartphone. 





The Lockee is an extremely versatile locking and tracking device that has multiple applications in the day-to-day lives of its owners. This unique and innovative device can be attached to your luggage and used both as a locking and tracking mechanism that can be monitored on your smartphone. If your luggage is lost the Lockee will provide an exact location for your belongings and you can contact one of our many international partners and our global return service will promptly return your baggage anywhere in the world within 48 hours!




The Lockee features a remotely controlled lock or open mechanism for user convenience. The application of the Lockee is designed to monitor all Lockee devices with these simple steps. The Smartphone app receives any notification about a change in the status of all Lockee devices. The Lockee was designed with the consumer in mind, so they operate on the three most common operating systems iOS, Android, and Windows phone that allow the maximum reach to the global Smartphone owners. 

The Lockee provides a secure unique bond between the device and its owner that prohibits anyone else from interacting with a particular Lockee device. Contacts of the user are entered into the application and transmitted to the Lockee and this data is obtained by using NFC technology which will be necessary for the 48 hour return of the Luggage to its owner.




Crowdfunding is an alternative funding solution that has allowed countless entrepreneurs to fund their dreams. Crowdfunding is a very labor intensive undertaking that requires the entrepreneur’s total focus and commitment to the promoting and marketing the project, but the reality is that once the project is funded the real work begins. Manufacturing is vital! You must be able to transform your prototype into a mass produced product. Manufacturing is especially complicated and complex.

The Lockee is a multi-functional “Smart Technology” driven device that has integrated all of the existing cutting-edge technologies for locking and tracking luggage, monitoring cars, bikes, and our loved ones into a compact lock/tracker synced to a Smartphone app. And this level design technology and functionality are only possible from the intense work ethic and innovation of leading engineers and designers. Prototyping and mass production are two vastly different skill sets. One of the major issues plaguing the crowdfunding industry is the inability of creators to take a product from prototype to manufactured and delivered product.

The Lockee has had the foresight to develop a partnership with APK COM, a manufacturing concern that has been in business since 1994. Their production facilities are based on a mutual partnership with Siemens, where all technological operations to be combined on a single platform. All the equipment on the production floor is modern and powerful. For example, Hitachi SIGMA G5 machine is capable of producing more than 200k components per hour and this factory is in close proximity to the developers of the Lockee project. Lockee has these manufacturing capabilities in place and is prepared to begin mass manufacturing in early 2016 at these regionally located state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities.








The basic Lockee was designed for the traveler that desires a certain level of comfort and reduced anxiety about one of the airline industry’s most critical issues, lost, stolen, or mishandled luggage.  The Lockee founder experienced this problem and had a family vacation ruined, so he invented the Lockee as his answer. 

The Lockee is a GSM-powered locking, tracking, and location device that will alert you the moment your Luggage moves unexpectedly or the lock is tampered with and it begins tracking it to an exact location.  The Lockee is a new breed of tracking devices that are using Bluetooth in combination with sensors and your Smartphone to track your luggage on a map, lock and unlock it without a physical key, and receive an alert if it's moved out of a certain zone.


The Lockee is a GSM-powered security device that will alert you the moment your bike moves unexpectedly and begins tracking it if it is stolen. The Lockee is a new breed of tracking devices that are using Bluetooth in combination with sensors and your smartphone to track your bike on a map, unlock it without a physical key, or receive an alert if it's moved out of a certain zone.


The Pendent Lockee is a multi-functional tracking and location device that has a magnet that can be attached to your car or to a fleet of vehicles. You simply attach it to a piece of metal using the magnet in the car or fleet vehicle in a concealed area and now your automobile is protected. The Lockee’s GSM –powered security device is not attached and activated, so in one easy step you now have the ability to monitor your car or fleet vehicles using an app on your Smart phone that will provide an alert if your vehicle is move and provide an exact real time location on a map of the vehicle. 



GSM tracking for elderly parents or those with special needs could be the difference between life and death. For those with Alzheimer's or dementia, a GSM tracker can alert a caregiver the instant a special needs patient wanders outside of their home. If the senior GSM tracker exits the home, you'll be notified immediately via text or email. Check on their location in real time right from your PC or smartphone and never worry that they'll go missing again.


Losing sight of your child, whether it's in a crowd or on the way to school, is one of the scariest moments a parent can experience. Thankfully, The Lockee Tracker provides a low-cost means to pinpoint your  child’s location instantly.  The Lockee is a  real-time GSM device that allows you to look up a location directly on your phone. Put your mind at ease with the Lockee as a child tracking solutions.

The Lockee GSM tracking device can be used for teenagers, you can be comfortable knowing that your teen is hitting the road safely. GSM  vehicle trackers  provide real-time location updates right from your smartphone, PC or tablet. The Lockee will encourage your teen driver's to practice good habits with a GSM tracker for parents.

A hiking trip is the one vacation that you remember years down the road and tell your children about. However, a hike can very easily turn dangerous. Every hiker's biggest fear is getting lost in the wilderness. The only foolproof way to let people know where you are is through GSM  tracking and the Lockee provides that as a low-cost multi-purpose device.

That early-morning scramble to find your keys before you leave the house doesn't have to be so frantic if you have your Lockee Keychain attached to your key ring.  It is no bigger than a standard key chain — and even smaller, in some cases — it integrate with your Smartphone to act as proximity sensors, alerting you when your keys are nearby or in danger of being left behind. Can you really afford not to have one of these to make those busy mornings less stressful? 



 










The idea of the Lockee project came as an epiphany in early 2014 on a joint family vacation abroad. We arrived at our beautiful vacation destination and Alexander’s wife discovered her suitcase was missing and the airline had no idea where or how they were going to locate and return the luggage. This obviously had a very negative impact on this exquisite holiday event.  The silver lining, was that this incident became the impetus, for the creation of the Lockee project as a baggage tracking and locking feature.

We began the process of market research and were astonished by the statistics. In 2013 there were more than 28 million bags lost worldwide and this staggering statistic does not include the theft of luggage. These stunning statistics led our team to create a prototype of the Lockee product and we are launching an Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign on December 8th 2015 to begin the production process in middle 2015. During this Indiegogo campaign we will pre-sell the device to attract and grow our global market.














So The Lockee looks similar to a few other projects I've have seen?

The Lockee may appear similar to other projects you have seen, but our use of GSM network technology, the sturdy armored locking cable, the keyless fingerprint biometric access and the durable waterproof case differentiates the Lockee from any other model on the market!!

Did you say I can also use the web?

Yes, we have designed an interface where you can use to remotely control your Lockee using your smartphone and using the web

What is the battery life?

The Lockee’s Lithium-ion battery provides autonomous operation for up to 14 days, and also has the ability to recharge the Lithium-ion battery using a transfer single from a base station of the GSM network, or a simple mechanism to connect to a desktop or laptop computer for the convenient recharging of the Lithium-ion battery

When can I expect my Lockee tracker?

Our goal is to ship the first bulk units towards the end of April-May-June 2015. We have worked closely with our manufactures over the last year, providing prototypes and designs so that once funding has been completed that we can push the button and get delivery.

How can I find out more information?

We value your input, so please use the contact items in this campaign and we will get back to you within 8 hours of your request. Were working around the clock to deliver an application and hardware device that you enjoy and want to shout about. Feel free to leave a comment or question at this email us at info @ mylockee.com

What phones and devices will work with the Lockee?

The Lockee will work with iOS and Android and we are working on compatibility with other platforms.

Are you sure I won’t have a problem with Airport security?

We have done our due diligence making sure that the device complies with travel industry standards. We have flown with prototypes all over the world many times, and we have never experienced any problems. We’ve gone through airport security like a breeze!  

Does Lockee use GPS?

No, the Lockee uses GSM network technology, which stands for Global System for Mobile communications and was the dominant 2G digital mobile phone standard for most of the world. It determines the way in which mobile phones communicate with the land-based network of towers. GSM uses cell phone towers to triangulate the position of the device.

Do I have to set my Lockee on flight mode, and how do I do it?

Regulations are constantly changing so its hard to be sure about the future. Currently as it stands you would not need to switch into airplane mode in USA or Europe. In some places where regulations are more strict it may be required. No worries, it can be done very easily from your phone.

Are there any countries in which Lockee will not operate?

Lockee works anywhere in the world! It does not depend on any third party network in order to work properly.

Am I supposed to manually add shipping?

When we create our perks on Indiegogo, we set the shipping costs and indicated whether a perk ships to one county, a handful of countries, one region, or anywhere in the world. So as a supporter of this project on only provides you shipping address, you will see the correct shipping amount automatically added to the final contribution amount.

Can I pick a color when I order?

We will have two colors Black and White as illustrated below in the graphic.



Each and every project carries with it certain risks. The most common risks are potential delays in tooling, obtaining raw materials, packaging, and shipping. While we feel like we have reduced these variables as much as possible, they can never be completely eliminated.

We feel our experience and familiarity with our manufacturer and the product development process gives us a unique skill set in handling unexpected problems. Most importantly, we will make sure to give frequent updates about progress so you'll always be informed about the status of the project. We think you'll find our transparency to be a breath of fresh air.
story_txt:
We, at the Lockee Project, want to thank you, our backers, for making the purchase of our unique and innovative product and to show our appreciation we are going to implement a new referral program to reward our backers for bringing more backers to the project.Current backers are our strongest supporters, so we are offering this incentive to you. For the backers that purchase the Lockee using your unique Indiegogo user ID. This Indiegogo user ID acts as your referral code that will allow you to receive a 10% refund from your referral  purchase price. For each additional purchase made by someone using your link you will receive this refund. If you are able to get enough referrals you can get your Lockee or Lockees for free!!. The entire process is really very simple choose your perk, share your link, and get your Lockee for FREE!! Not convinced? Check out updates tab above for something even more catchy...
In 2014, the total number mishandled bags  by the airline industry was 26.2 million. Upon closer examination of the details they show that delayed bags comprised 81.2% of the total mishandled bags. Damaged or pilfered bags account for 15.5% of mishandled bags and 3.3% were declared lost or stolen. Mishandled bags cost the airline industry a total of $2.09 US billion in 2014, so reducing expenditure on mishandled bags would have a positive impact on the airline industry's bottom line and provide an improved customer experience.﻿The Lockee is a unique and innovative "Smart
Technology" product that provides the traveler with the ability to lock,
track, and locate their luggage by securing the bag with the Lockee device and
tracking it with an app on their Smartphone, but what differentiates the Lockee
from similar products on the market is that once your lost or mishandled
baggage is located Lockee, through a global partnership, will return your
property within a 48 hour time frame.  
The Lockee is fully TSA compliant and accepted because we know
that the world we live in today has many threats so security checks are an
unavoidable part of and are absolutely necessary for our safety. In some
countries, TSA’s standardized keys can securely unlock and re-lock travel locks
on luggage pieces undergoing security checks. TSA agents are authorized to cut
and dispose of any locks that can’t be unlocked using the TSA Master Keys. Remember
the Lockee was designed with customer convenience in mind.The Lockee is the prime example of a “Smart Technology”
driven product designed to meet the needs of its customers. The Lockee uses
SMs-GSM Networks to enhance its ability to act as a global tracking device that
provides the user with state-of the-art locking, tracking, and location
capabilities that are conveniently accessed by one’s ubiquitous Smartphone. 
The Lockee is an extremely versatile locking and tracking device that has multiple applications in the day-to-day lives of its owners. This unique and innovative device can be attached to your luggage and used both as a locking and tracking mechanism that can be monitored on your smartphone. If your luggage is lost the Lockee will provide an exact location for your belongings and you can contact one of our many international partners and our global return service will promptly return your baggage anywhere in the world within 48 hours!
The Lockee features a remotely controlled lock or open mechanism for user convenience. The application of the Lockee is designed to monitor all Lockee devices with these simple steps. The Smartphone app receives any notification about a change in the status of all Lockee devices. The Lockee was designed with the consumer in mind, so they operate on the three most common operating systems iOS, Android, and Windows phone that allow the maximum reach to the global Smartphone owners. 
The Lockee provides a secure unique bond between the device and its owner that prohibits anyone else from interacting with a particular Lockee device. Contacts of the user are entered into the application and transmitted to the Lockee and this data is obtained by using NFC technology which will be necessary for the 48 hour return of the Luggage to its owner.



Crowdfunding is an alternative funding solution that has allowed countless entrepreneurs to fund their dreams. Crowdfunding is a very labor intensive undertaking that requires the entrepreneur’s total focus and commitment to the promoting and marketing the project, but the reality is that once the project is funded the real work begins. Manufacturing is vital! You must be able to transform your prototype into a mass produced product. Manufacturing is especially complicated and complex.



The Lockee is a multi-functional “Smart Technology” driven device that has integrated all of the existing cutting-edge technologies for locking and tracking luggage, monitoring cars, bikes, and our loved ones into a compact lock/tracker synced to a Smartphone app. And this level design technology and functionality are only possible from the intense work ethic and innovation of leading engineers and designers. Prototyping and mass production are two vastly different skill sets. One of the major issues plaguing the crowdfunding industry is the inability of creators to take a product from prototype to manufactured and delivered product.

The Lockee has had the foresight to develop a partnership with APK COM, a manufacturing concern that has been in business since 1994. Their production facilities are based on a mutual partnership with Siemens, where all technological operations to be combined on a single platform. All the equipment on the production floor is modern and powerful. For example, Hitachi SIGMA G5 machine is capable of producing more than 200k components per hour and this factory is in close proximity to the developers of the Lockee project. Lockee has these manufacturing capabilities in place and is prepared to begin mass manufacturing in early 2016 at these regionally located state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities.








The basic Lockee was designed for the traveler that desires a
certain level of comfort and reduced anxiety about one of the airline industry’s
most critical issues, lost, stolen, or mishandled luggage.  The Lockee founder experienced this problem
and had a family vacation ruined, so he invented the Lockee as his answer.  

The Lockee is a GSM-powered locking, tracking, and location
device that will alert you the moment your Luggage moves unexpectedly or the
lock is tampered with and it begins tracking it to an exact location.  The Lockee is a new breed of tracking devices
that are using Bluetooth in combination with sensors and your Smartphone to
track your luggage on a map, lock and unlock it without a physical key, and receive
an alert if it's moved out of a certain zone.



The Lockee is a GSM-powered security device that will alert you the moment your bike moves unexpectedly and begins tracking it if it is stolen. The Lockee is a new breed of tracking devices that are using Bluetooth in combination with sensors and your smartphone to track your bike on a map, unlock it without a physical key, or receive an alert if it's moved out of a certain zone.



The Pendent Lockee is a multi-functional tracking and
location device that has a magnet that can be attached to your car or to a
fleet of vehicles. You simply attach it to a piece of metal using the magnet in
the car or fleet vehicle in a concealed area and now your automobile is
protected. The Lockee’s GSM –powered security device is not attached and
activated, so in one easy step you now have the ability to monitor your car or
fleet vehicles using an app on your Smart phone that will provide an alert if
your vehicle is move and provide an exact real time location on a map of the
vehicle. 

GSM tracking for elderly parents or those with special needs could be the difference between life and death. For those with Alzheimer's or dementia, a GSM tracker can alert a caregiver the instant a special needs patient wanders outside of their home. If the senior GSM tracker exits the home, you'll be notified immediately via text or email. Check on their location in real time right from your PC or smartphone and never worry that they'll go missing again.


Losing sight of your child, whether it's in a crowd or on the way to school, is one of the scariest moments a parent can experience. Thankfully, The Lockee Tracker provides a low-cost means to pinpoint your  child’s location instantly.  The Lockee is a  real-time GSM device that allows you to look up a location directly on your phone. Put your mind at ease with the Lockee as a child tracking solutions.The Lockee GSM tracking device can be used for teenagers, you can be 
comfortable knowing that your teen is hitting the road safely. GSM  vehicle trackers  provide real-time location updates right from your 
smartphone, PC or tablet. The Lockee will encourage your teen driver's 
to practice good habits with a GSM tracker for parents.
A hiking trip is the one vacation that you remember years down the 
road and tell your children about. However, a hike can very easily turn 
dangerous. Every hiker's biggest fear is getting lost in the wilderness.
 The only foolproof way to let people know where you are is through GSM  tracking and the Lockee provides that as a low-cost multi-purpose 
device. 




That
early-morning scramble to find your keys before you leave the house doesn't
have to be so frantic if you have your Lockee Keychain attached to your key
ring.  It is no bigger than a standard
key chain — and even smaller, in some cases — it integrate with your Smartphone
to act as proximity sensors, alerting you when your keys are nearby or in danger
of being left behind. Can you really afford not to have one of these to make those
busy mornings less stressful? 












 










The idea of the Lockee project came as an epiphany in early 2014 on a joint family vacation abroad. We arrived at our beautiful vacation destination and Alexander’s wife discovered her suitcase was missing and the airline had no idea where or how they were going to locate and return the luggage. This obviously had a very negative impact on this exquisite holiday event.  The silver lining, was that this incident became the impetus, for the creation of the Lockee project as a baggage tracking and locking feature.
We began the process of market research and were astonished by the statistics. In 2013 there were more than 28 million bags lost worldwide and this staggering statistic does not include the theft of luggage. These stunning statistics led our team to create a prototype of the Lockee product and we are launching an Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign on December 8th 2015 to begin the production process in middle 2015. During this Indiegogo campaign we will pre-sell the device to attract and grow our global market.

story:
OUR JOURNEY

Our journey isn't just our business, it's the life that got us to this point.  It's the people that have loved and helped us along the way and it's the trials and decisions(good and bad)we have lived through to become who we are.

story:
Hi, we're Greg, Clay and Kate - the founders of FOG Territory.  Realizing the benefits of actively participating in outdoor activities, we conceived FOG Territory with one simple mission - encourage, motivate, and help more people get outside more often.

If you are like us, you have noticed that you never get to spend enough time sharing favorite outdoor pastimes or new adventures with family and friends. This is no way to live. Participating in outdoor recreation increases focus and provides a stress-free sense of mindfulness. In addition, these experiences support good health, productivity and creativeness. 

Last year, we brought together a dedicated team and hired the services of outside agencies to look at how we could help people live life to the fullest. Out of our collective efforts, we created FOG Territory and the FOG Model. 

The FOG Model will save you time and money: 

  • 20-40% savings on FOG-Worthy brands of outdoor gear and apparel (not just close out or discontinued items!)
  • 10% savings on FOG-Certified charter/guide services and other adventure activities

Other benefits include:

  • Access to an online community of people that are living healthy, active, extraordinary lives
  • Links to various local resources such as instructors, classes and groups 
  • A meet-up app so you never have to go solo again
  • The services of a dedicated team including independent gear/activity testers and quality improvement/member experience staff acting as advocates for FOG Territory club members

Active FOG members will enjoy a new sense of empowerment.

Whether you are male or female, an outdoor enthusiast, weekend warrior, or just want to spend a bit more time outside, FOG Territory will fuel your passion.  

Being member driven, you will direct and prioritize our efforts towards the activities you participate in most often, whether it be water or snow sports, fishing or hunting, biking, hiking or running. 

The FOG Model consists of 4 key programs, and as a club built by members for members, programs and benefits will be added as membership grows and member ideas are incorporated.

FOG Life captures and redefines the appeal of active aging and will inspire and influence FOGs to get outside as part of day to day life. FOG members will receive articles, videos, podcasts, reviews, and so much more. Whether you want to learn a new sport or keep up with latest developments on technology and techniques, FOG Life has you covered. 

 

FOG Savings provides you with a trusted resource for identifying and purchasing gear, apparel and outdoor activities at the absolute lowest price from FOG-Worthy brands. We encourage you to identify brands, products or activities which you feel would be beneficial to other members, and we will immediately explore expanding our network. After all, we work on your behalf. 

 

 

FOG Link provides links to on-line and local resources - retailers, classes and groups that specialize in activities related to your latest gear purchase. This ensures better and more frequent use of gear.

 

FOG Friend is a meet-up app that will help you locate someone to share your adventures with if you desire not to go solo.

Last but not least, FOG Territory sets a new benchmark as a model for establishing and operating a socially responsible company.

FOG Territory will:

    Thru this Indiegogo Campaign we are raising funds to build a critical mass of FOG members. For as the FOG Territory membership grows, so will the benefits and rewards in an exponential fashion. Based on projections of membership we anticipate the following timeline for implementation of the various components of the FOG Model.

    On behalf of the entire FOG Team, we invite you to join the FOG Movement, and be among the very first to enjoy the empowering and life enhancing benefits that come with being a FOG member. Whether you choose to sponsor us in raising funds or not, we ask you to please share our campaign with your friends and family. 

    Thank you for helping us build FOG Territory - www.FOGTerritory.com

    It's not just a way of life, it's the only way to live!

story:
Welcome to Our Adventure.

We are a collection of raggedy 20-somethings planning for what is often described as the greatest adventure in the world. Representing three continents, Henry and Morgan (New Zealand), Milena (Argentina), and Brian (U.S.A) will join 500 other cars crossing from London to the European continent on July 16th commencing on a trip through up to 40 countries, eight time zones and 10,000 miles. Rally Rule #1 dictates that outside our four doors there is no support, no tow trucks, no phone-an-F1-mechanic-friend, just a map, our wits, and an emergency tow rope. Rally organisers offer no direction, only a deadline, how long we take and the route we follow is over to us.


I'd love to join, but I've got an ummm family emergency and/or illnesses... 
Not everyone can be there with us, so followers will be treated to daily* updates, photos, videos, and personal blogs, giving you the opportunity to live vicariously through us as we travel east through the most intense cultural landscapes on the planet. Arguments with armed border guards, fermented goats milk, language barriers, mechanical failures on lonely kazakh roads, these are the things that will make this rally the most interesting thing on the internet since the Dos Equis guy! Follow our adventures and thank yourselves that you had the good sense not to come with us! 
Did we mention rule #2 yet? Our car, our chariot, our noble steed must not exceed 1000cc's, barely big enough to fit four children, let alone four fully grown adults. And their belongings and a spare tire.

the route
Lending a Hand

We would love for you to follow us on our travels but we need your support. No, we are not a charity, but the third and final rule of the Mongol Rally is that we must raise awareness and money for a couple. A minimum of GBP£1000/ USD$1400/ NZD$2100 between two charities, to be precise. 
The International Rescue Committee provides emergency relief, and long term humanitarian aid to displaced persons and refugees, offering medical services, international development, and education to help refugees settle and become self sufficient. They are regarded as being among the most transparent, accountable, and financially responsible organisations worldwide with a rating of 95.04/100 on charity navigator. 


Cool Earth is the official charity of the Mongol rally, these guys work to save rainforests through purchasing land and leaving it in protective trusts, and offer continued support through with education, employment, and volunteers. Both of these organisations do immensely important work and we're so proud and excited to be a part of support them!


So why the Crowdfunder?
This trip will be life-defining, but it will also require meticulous preparation and a lot of supplies. The team is investing tireless hours, efforts, and dollars into making this dream a reality, but the reality is, we can't do it alone. We are seeking out donations in whatever form you can offer, every small boost is another meal, its the tool we need to fix the clutch. A bed for a night with that Turkish foreign exchange student who just added you on Facebook, a few air miles, anything! 
There are two ways for you to help: Firstly, here on indiegogo where we'll throw you some love, or a postcard, or a funky trinket from a country we can barely pronounce the name of. Secondly, SHARE THE WORD!!! This is a big deal for us; we think its pretty cool and that pretty much everyone will want to hear about it. Not only this, but if you DON'T tell them, they'll probably take you off the christmas card list or do something equally drastic. Tell everyone you know, and every some people you don't know! We'll make it super easy for you, just go to our facebook page, click share with ALL friends, and copy this into the text box:

"Attention friends who are interested in awesome people doing awesome things. If you want to bring a little more awesome into your lives, do yourselves a favour and follow facebook.com/teamyakontrack and watch this carload of crazies drive a mini-sized car from London to Mongolia over the next couple of months. If you donate to their cause they'll even send you something cool from Uzbekistan or Serbia!"

Or words to that effect. Honestly, it'll take you less time to post than to come up with an excuse. and your friends will thank you for it- wouldn't you want to know?? So please donate, share, or do both!!!

As a supporter

Your donation will help us with the extensive costs of the trip- the entrance fee, the deposit we pay to the organisers to ensure the car is not left to rust should it be unusable when it arrives in Mongolia, expensive visas for certain countries,meals, insurance and airfares. Other known costs include cold hard US currency for greasing the palms of dodgy border officials, and on a more grim not- emergency situations such as extortion, and emergency medical evacuations which have been required on past rallies. And none of this covers the minimum donation we need to come up with.

Your donation will help us around our financial constraints, it will help make the world a more interesting place, it will help to bring awareness to a couple of amazing organizations tasked with enormous goals

Finally, it will help four pretty awesome kids off on an adventure that will define who we are moving forward, and leave us with a story we'll tell our grandchildren certain parts of.

Okay. Sweet. Love it. But Lets get to the Perks.
Right you are! Even if you don't donate a single cent/penny/pence, we want to thank you for getting to this part of our lengthy diatribe by granting you unlimited, irrevocable access to all of our content. Keep an eye on our adventures, like, upvote, or +1 our photos, laugh hysterically at our experiences and hope for our safety when we disappear off the face of the internet for more than a couple of days. And of course share share share! We think we've got some pretty cool perks going on. Every perk gets our well deserved love, appreciation and mad props, the more you donate, the more epically remunerated you shall be. From postcards, polaroids and paintings, to the chance to ride with us, your contribution will go towards making this whole adventure a reality.

Thank you, thank you, thank you,
xoxo
Team Yak on Track

the route

Lending a Hand
We would love for you to follow us on our travels but we need your support. No, we are not a charity, but the third and final rule of the Mongol Rally is that we must raise awareness and money for a couple. A minimum of GBP£1000/ USD$1400/ NZD$2100 between two charities, to be precise. The International Rescue Committee provides emergency relief, and long term humanitarian aid to displaced persons and refugees, offering medical services, international development, and education to help refugees settle and become self sufficient. They are regarded as being among the most transparent, accountable, and financially responsible organisations worldwide with a rating of 95.04/100 on charity navigator. 




Cool Earth is the official charity of the Mongol rally, these guys work to save rainforests through purchasing land and leaving it in protective trusts, and offer continued support through with education, employment, and volunteers. Both of these organisations do immensely important work and we're so proud and excited to be a part of support them!



So why the Crowdfunder?
This trip will be life-defining, but it will also require meticulous preparation and a lot of supplies. The team is investing tireless hours, efforts, and dollars into making this dream a reality, but the reality is, we can't do it alone. We are seeking out donations in whatever form you can offer, every small boost is another meal, its the tool we need to fix the clutch. A bed for a night with that Turkish foreign exchange student who just added you on Facebook, a few air miles, anything! 
There are two ways for you to help: Firstly, here on indiegogo where we'll throw you some love, or a postcard, or a funky trinket from a country we can barely pronounce the name of. Secondly, SHARE THE WORD!!! This is a big deal for us; we think its pretty cool and that pretty much everyone will want to hear about it. Not only this, but if you DON'T tell them, they'll probably take you off the christmas card list or do something equally drastic. Tell everyone you know, and every some people you don't know! We'll make it super easy for you, just go to our facebook page, click share with ALL friends, and copy this into the text box:


"Attention friends who are interested in awesome people doing awesome things. If you want to bring a little more awesome into your lives, do yourselves a favour and follow facebook.com/teamyakontrack and watch this carload of crazies drive a mini-sized car from London to Mongolia over the next couple of months. If you donate to their cause they'll even send you something cool from Uzbekistan or Serbia!"

Or words to that effect. Honestly, it'll take you less time to post than to come up with an excuse. and your friends will thank you for it- wouldn't you want to know?? So please donate, share, or do both!!!

As a supporter
Your donation will help us with the extensive costs of the trip- the entrance fee, the deposit we pay to the organisers to ensure the car is not left to rust should it be unusable when it arrives in Mongolia, expensive visas for certain countries,meals, insurance and airfares. Other known costs include cold hard US currency for greasing the palms of dodgy border officials, and on a more grim not- emergency situations such as extortion, and emergency medical evacuations which have been required on past rallies. And none of this covers the minimum donation we need to come up with.
Your donation will help us around our financial constraints, it will help make the world a more interesting place, it will help to bring awareness to a couple of amazing organizations tasked with enormous goals
Finally, it will help four pretty awesome kids off on an adventure that will define who we are moving forward, and leave us with a story we'll tell our grandchildren certain parts of.
Okay. Sweet. Love it. But Lets get to the Perks.


Right you are! Even if you don't donate a single cent/penny/pence, we want to thank you for getting to this part of our lengthy diatribe by granting you unlimited, irrevocable access to all of our content. Keep an eye on our adventures, like, upvote, or +1 our photos, laugh hysterically at our experiences and hope for our safety when we disappear off the face of the internet for more than a couple of days. And of course share share share! We think we've got some pretty cool perks going on. Every perk gets our well deserved love, appreciation and mad props, the more you donate, the more epically remunerated you shall be. From postcards, polaroids and paintings, to the chance to ride with us, your contribution will go towards making this whole adventure a reality.Thank you, thank you, thank you,xoxoTeam Yak on Track

story:
In order to develop the Reflexx-tires we need €164000/ This money will be spent on:

  • Specially designed profile
  • Specially designed tire template
  • Developing environmentally friendly reflection strips
  • Testing based on different weather conditions
  • Producing the first 10,000 tires
  • Shipping to our hero backers

 

      

After doing a lot of research and visiting tire manufacturers to learn more about the process, we asked advice from a retired product manager of one of the largest tire manufacturer in the world to tell us what kind of cost and problems we may face. This gave us information to start the project. So the conclusion is very accurate and sharp.

The benefits of the Reflexx-tires are that you are always visible as a cyclist. Of course, Reflexx does not replace your current lighting, but it makes sure that you are visible if you don't have a working light on your bicycle. Being visible in traffic is more important than seeing.

 

At the moment, many cyclists die annually as a result of an accident. The main reason is poor visibility. More than 1,250,000 people are killed every year as a result of a traffic crash. Over 50% of these victims are cyclists (625,000). Comparing this with the number of fatal victims worldwide by terrorism in 2015 that was 28689 people. It is shocking that so many people die by something simple as not being visible.

In order to keep the risks as low as possible, we have done a very extensive preliminary investigation. We have requested different offers through different tire manufacturers. Of course, you can always deal with unforeseen costs here we have also taken into account in the amount.

  • It can be a challenge that we have to fit in a lot of different tire sizes.
  • A risk can be that you get copycats and that can affect our name.

We need to raise € 164000 for developing and the first production run.  If we'll be unable to raise the full amount, we will put the €5,€15 &€35 Perks in developing and testing of the product. Our €65,- backers can get a 90% refund

We’ve sweetened the deal by creating some really great perks. You can get just the front tire, rear tire and the full bundle front and rear. Check them out!

When the campaign ends you'll receive a survey. You can choose your size and color.  Plus, you can upgrade or add more tires if you want.

 Can't contribute? No problem! There are other ways you can help us:

  • Help us to get the word out and make some noise about the Reflexx-tires campaign
  • You can share the campaign right now!

Help us achieve our goal to make the world safer for all!

Reflexx-tires give permanent visibility of the cyclist in traffic. This increases the cyclists' safety in traffic.

Meet the founders
Tim Bakker: animator  | entrepreneur | inventor
Reshad Zia: bachelor law student | entrepreneur | inventor

  • Tim: As an animator, I'm always looking for good ideas and cool projects to turn into animation. My goal is to make ideas understandable for the target audience! So what's more beautiful than helping people with your idea and work.

  • Reshad: As a law Student, I'm always looking for ways to help people around me and handle their best interests. We have the feeling that we are doing that with the Reflexx-tyres. We believe that we can make a difference in many people's lives and make riding your bike safer. As an entrepreneur I always keep the interests of the investor first.  

Our goal is to reduce the number of victims in traffic accidents with any obstructions. Right now the numbers of accidents are way too high!

Press contact: info@reflexx-tires.com

story:
Translation of Biblical Literature Worshipper.info & VisualBible.info

3 years ago I was involved in a car accident that damaged over 10 bones from neck right down the whole spine. As such I stayed in my room/home for 3 yrs hardly going out due to the pain and imbalance.  (Xrays/Pics at the bottom of page).
During this time the Bible became my companion and I began to make myself Bible videos so I would not slip into depression and anger at life's curveball.  Then I thought, well, maybe it would be better to put it on youtube and let others be blessed as well. So I started a website http://VisualBible.info 
Later I decided to work on articles and people asked if I could translate the articles in various languages so they could use them in their churches etc. So I began to invest all my time, money and energy into translation work.  Thus began the new project: http://Worshipper.info
1-5 languages would be manageable but we're translating them into 50 languages, a very pricey project and funds have depleted.
I also wanted to work on an illustrated Bible project http://BibleAce.com but could not get the funding I needed to pay the artists. Hopefully with your help I can start again.

I would like to ask you to support these projects in any way you can.

Short URL:  http://bit.ly/worshipper

Endorsements: http://worshipper.info/endorsements.html
Testimonials: http://worshipper.info/testimonials.html


What We Need 

Computer:
  • We urgently need a powerful laptop capable of video/movie editing. 
  • The current laptop soundcard is dead... Which makes video editing extremely rough. 
Translation:
  • We need at least $1000-2000 to do more translations in 50 languages.
  • We need stock footage licenses to make our videos.
  • We currently pay $55 per translator, so it gets pricey real fast.
Music:
We are currently producing original music in various countries (and languages). Music is currently being produced in:
  • UK https://youtu.be/kZP3OGGbhZI
  • US https://youtu.be/0twQ3ALyad4
  • Scotland
  • France https://youtu.be/BAtlpLyuYzg
  • China (Mandarin) https://youtu.be/mQ_xgLT3xzM
  • India (Tamil)
  • Malaysia https://youtu.be/OHgXWNT-NV4
  • Turkey (Turkish/English) https://youtu.be/8eY0CORbeiY
  • Ireland (Irish/English)
  • Serbia
  • etc
Genre: Blues, Jazz, Pop, EDM, Rap, Country, Rock, Folk, Gaelic, etc

The Impact

The videos are uploaded on youtube and we make them accessible freely to everyone to use for ministry (non commercial), without having to write us for license to use in church, school, ministry etc.  You are welcome to freely download the videos using  a youtube downloader.  The videos and articles are being used by many people around the world.

Risks & Challenges

Our money is totally spent on the multilingual translations and we need help to continue this Bible project.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please do tell your friends about the projects we've done lately at http://VisualBible.info and http://Worshipper.info


http://gph.is/1EqfzZp

Bare minimum targets;


--

--
