story:
Oh hey there friends!  Thanks for stopping by my “awkwardly desperate plea for donations towards a rerun of my project”, or ADPfDTaROMP for short.

Some time ago, I was home, alone listening to music, and thought to myself: - Gotta create a classic, Gotta do it in an attic… and so I did!

In a concerted effort to delay becoming a homeless layabout who lives and sleeps on the streets , I am attempting to restart my career by creating a product that everyone will learn to love, a product everyone will find hard to live without,  a product I have engineered.

The first croudfunding project I created, “Plan A”, Did not go according to plan...

             

Noo, not the funky chicken, although.... that is an idea to consider... Anyway, failing sucks, but it's better than the alternative, which is not trying. So, here I am again with “Plan B”.

The idea was first developed by McLaren, who had some similar, custom made toolboxes, for their factory.  And the great American manufacturer Craftsman also has a similar "High End" toolbox with subwoofer and a elevating screen.

Source:http://gfwilliams.net/a-trip-to-the-mclaren-factory-2/

We just went quite a few steps up from that idea. We are now in the stage of manufacturing called research in which we choose suppliers, test hardware, and plan a launch schedule.

Now you may be asking yourself, “(insert your name here), I am a high powered (insert occupation).  Why should I, (insert name again,) give Filipe and his staff my hard earned money, just to enable his naïve, pie in sky, dreams of someday possibly being a neurotic, out of work and suicidal engineer?”  Which is, in all honesty, a valid, but pretty harsh question.  Take it easy man, we are just trying here.  Brilliant ideas don’t make companies successful; the people who execute those ideas do.

Here is the trajectory for the project:

Step 1 – Raise money

Step 2 – Do an extensive testing program

Step 3 – Spread the word online and offline

Step 4 – Various "Hollywood style" wheelings and dealings

Step 5 – Take the workshop world, by storm.

In all seriousness, starting an entrepreneur project is something about which we are extremely passionate.  Over the last few years, the internet has become an amazing medium for aspiring entrepreneurs to gain notice from every industry.  Many people in all aspects of product creation have started from a simple twitter feed, and I feel with my past experience and the talented people I have around me, I have created a product, that will get the name of our company out there.  

So, without further delay, here is our project:

Presume unalike!!! And think outside the box (see what I did there ?)

                 

                                "Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication."
                                                      Leonardo da Vinci

Rui Galvão Soares, one of our team members

The Extreme Workstation Toolbox starts off where the original stopped.

This visionary idea coming to life... will change the way you use a toolbox, forever!!

Visionary people face the same problems everyone else does. But, they commit themselves to finding alternative solutions.

EWT-Digital, is the logical toolbox solution, for every car workshop. It is the ultimate solution and, will help bring your business into the 21st Century.

So, what makes our product so good?

1. Delivers on a singular value proposition in a world-class way

2. Simple, intuitive, and anticipates needs

3. Exceeds expectations

4. Changes the user's life for the better

Until now no-one has taken much time and effort, to research, and understand the workshop tools market, and how it could be improved, in a highly desirable way, using technology. We have significant experience in the design, delivery, and implementation, of high technology systems. In addition, we have complete understanding of the needs and desires, around the unique workshop market world.

Car Workshops can no longer thrive with old strategies in today’s multi-dimensional industry cycle.

There are five strategic factors to consider:

1. Re-think the workshop  model
2. Drive tighter connections between your workshop and the digital world.
3. Elevate the in-workshop experience
4. Reboot the diagnostic process
5. Challenge traditional organizational structure

Don’t Tweak Your workshop Rethink It End to End

                          

To help drive profitable growth, we urge mechanics, engineers to completely rethink the workshop format and proactively shift to a new end-state; one that plays a distinct and relevant role given the new automotive configuration, maintenance and repair behaviors and tools, that are here to stay.

Computerized cars and standardized interfaces have been a benefit, for auto mechanics and manufacturers worldwide. 

Thus the time has come to rethink their approach, to retool. and to use new, specific methods and strategies.

To quote  Werner Huber from BMW about their BMW i3 electric car that can autonomously park itself : "We appreciate what Google is doing since they’re promoting the idea of the autonomous car and preparing the ground for us,” said Huber. “But we are coming at it from another side. As a car manufacturer, we are very experienced in building cars and we have to adopt more processes of an IT company.”

 

(http://www.thedrum.com/news/2015/01/08/car-brands-closing-disconnect-between-mobile-experiences-and-driving)

With our Extreme Workstation our clients will have all their charts, tables, testing software , internet and all the tools they may need, in one place.

Covering all these needs the Extreme Workstation comes complete with a set of distinct and ever-important features, such as:

High Definition Large Screen (also available optional touch screen)

USB ports (to allow you to connect your interfaces and any other gear you may need)

Power plugs, for every need (mains, usb and 12v supply)

Wireless keyboard and mouse

Our main goal is to create an affordable toolbox with built in, windows based computer. No more need for a computer and a toolbox. But we have tailored options for every need:


A (removable) professional portable computer, connected by a docking station. With this feature you will be able to connect your computer at your workshop as you arrive, take it home afterwords and, next day, connect it at the Extreme Workstation Toolbox, at the race track Pit Box.

More affordable models will have their own built in computer 

We will have other models with multi screen and multi computer capability.

The Extreme Workstation Toolbox is a must for any workshop. Your measurements and/or analysis take place in front of you on a large screen.

                                  There will be no more need to work on your lap.

                           

The large screen will allow you to see every small detail of your schematics and/or measuring software even if you are sitting in a nearby car or near its engine.


       

        


Begin your journey now.

With this never-before-seen Toolbox, your workshop will enter the future.

Ever hear about a unique business or invention -- something so obvious, you slap yourself on the forehead and say "Now why didn't I think of that?"

That's what EWT-Digital, is all about -- Simple, yet innovative ideas that just make sense.


                                   


We start by inviting you to crowdfund the first step of our journey. In return, we will be providing you with access to the inner workings of a work force team from its early days of development, revealing information that is normally a closely guarded secret, 

We are offering you the potential, of being involved, of getting the feedback and the inner stories.

Make sure you are ready to embark on this journey. The Extreme Workstation Toolbox aims to reach the ultimate dream, wich is to have its place on every major workshop arround the world, even reaching the motor racing world, and many other exciting places.  One of the reasons that the workshops are going to benefit so much from our services is due to the ability to collect and analyze data on a global scale.

The Extreme Workstation Toolbox will appeal to many groups of people, who are interested in cars, fans, drivers and engineers. We are going to provide them unrivalled access to our team. Our EWT-Digital WebPage, a knowledge-sharing and e-learning portal will bring you closer to the action, and will allow you to learn and develop your own skills in the car world, whether you are an amateur or a professional.

By creating this new Extreme Workstation and and by using the "world of the Internet", we will bring the Car World closer together.

Your help will give us all the chance to be part of the team from the start. We will create a large community and we will start to see the power of a collective force that will attract the funds and partners to make this journey a success. Come and join us, help us create a piece of history.

We will start with a humble engineering workshop in Portugal, to go on and "dominate" the world.

We are recreating the tool box and its use. We are creating a product that will be "The choice" of all of the new generation top engineers and car technicians in the world.

The money from the first phase of crowdfunding, will be used to build a more simplified version of the final product, bringing together, the elements that are required for you to follow, and contribute, towards our early progress. From then on, it turns into a much more engaging and powerful goal.

Interact with us

                           


Members of EWT-Digital, will interact and contribute towards collaborative decisions, in a way no company has attempted before. We will share everything from our search for the best componentes, right up to the first work bench build, tested and delivered.

This toolbox will become the gateway for live telemetry, measuring, and diagnostic, giving the major contributors a behind-the-scenes glimpse of the idea involved here. Major contributors, will have remote access, live camera feed to the machine, and will be able to work with it "on spot".

Our online page will include modules such as:

·  Understanding the car and advice around set-up 

·  Developing a creative mentality

·  Media training

·  Advice from experts

·  Suggested ideas from specialists

·  As well as debriefs when we are testing and diagnosing

There will be a Cloud service with a number of specific related apps at the members disposal

We will gather people with a lot of experience. This is your chance to get the same kind of insight, that helped them reach the top.

How your money will be spent

Your Contributions will go directly to the hardware, software, location, tools, licensing, website creation/administration, administrative costs, advertising, communications, transportation, shipping & mail basically to get this Project off of the ground.

We also aim to have a Toolbox in place, at Autodromo do Estoril. Major companies (including prestigious F1 teams, who come here often for tests) will be able to use it and “test drive it” on spot. (with multi screen and multi computer capability): 

          

·  Makes long-term client more likely and more sustainable

·  Makes sponsorship more attractive to brands

·  Involves fans more than ever before

To put it simply, the more we raise, and the more people who show their support, the sooner we can develop, the The Extreme Workstation Toolbox and go places with it

We will provide you with:

·  The front-end of the new EWT-Digital portal

·  Provide you with the ability to watch and contribute to the team’s initial stages of development

·  The ability to vote and interact on certain team decisions from the offset

·  Video, written and audio updates, from the team .

·  A comprehensive prospectus, that will allow us to go after the next big investment, required to take this idea worldwide, and make it part of every major workshop arround the world

Stretch Goals

Once we have passed the initial €25.000 target, we can start to progress the next phases, without requiring additional investment straight away. When we reach a total of €25,000 we will be able to start building and creating, more complex experiences straight away, and create the back-office of the team

·  Later, we will look for additional investment, so we can source our factory, and assembly line.

Show Support

If you would like to simply show support, for The Extreme Workstation Toolbox, and keep up-to-date, with our progress, you can invest just one pound. You won’t be participating in the experiences we have lined up, but your contribution helps confirm to our investors that we’re onto a good idea.

Why share our secrets?

When people hear about The Extreme Workstation Toolbox, they ask? Why we are happy to give away our secrets, to our competitors. There are two reasons, transparency gets rid of barriers, that often create disharmony in a team and, promotes even greater creativity. secondly, if your competitors can only win, by chasing your tail, then they won’t be able, to hold pace for very long.

Our new Extreme Workstation Toolbox challenges the current thinking of what a Toobox should be, and modernises the fan/sponsor relationship.

With the birth of the web, and social media, the world communicates differently, resulting in a change in the way people interact, and receive their information. This "world of ideas", is starting to catch up, but we feel, it’s ready to go a step further.

In essence, we’re proposing a new model for manufacturing, one where transparency, and free-flow of information, works to the benefit of the team, and the benefit of the participating individuals.

We already have several requests for the product, all we need is make it a reality:

                                              

“Please email me more information on the product” - Eric Min

“What is the cost and do you have representation in Brasil” - Claudio Sousa

“You have like this ?” - Bob G Bitar

“We are in the main busines of auto repair tools, we can provide you with measuring tools, and maybe you can provide us with your products” - Linda Li

“Can you send to Venezuela? and what are the costs ?” - Enmanuel Rodriguez

“I love your product, do you have representation in Brasil ?” - Romeri Cunha Silva

These are just a few examples...

Help us make The Extreme Workstation Toolbox a reality!

As with all projects, success is only possible, when you overcome potential challenges.

                                       


The most important thing, is that people show their support, by participating in the campaign, however they can. An investor would like to see huge uptake, before they put serious money, into funding a project like ours. Even a one pound donation, will show other supporters, you believe this is a good idea, whatever your financial situation. As such, your one pound, will go a long way in creating history.

If you can not contribute, we understand. But you can still help. Share, blog, tweet, comment, post, chat...

              

The reality is, The Extreme Workstation Toolbox, is a highly effective tool. Clients with EWT-Digital, will be able to make analysys, and testing in a complete new way. Each user of The EWT-Digital Toolbox, will have a unique product, tailored to his/her spacific needs. And even being able to use dedicated Cloud Computing services in a near future.

About the Cloud

Cloud computing is the future but not only for hosting, it is becoming the way we compute. The way businesses operate, due to the crescent number of applications and technology that are becoming more accessible. Most importantly, cloud computing is helping many businesses with all the great tools and technology that was only available to big enterprises with a ton of money.

             


Even if you don't know what cloud computing is, chances are you could be already using it on a day-to-day basis. Do you use Gmail, or Dropbox, or Google Drive, or iCloud, or any of the millions of websites that run on a cloud server?

You are just enjoying all the benefits of cloud computing. To think about the capabilities of this technology. One can only speculate how cloud computing is going to evolve and how it is going to affect the way we work and do business in a near future.

The EWT-Digital launch is planned to be Quarter 4 - 2015 after an extensive testing program. Please consider helping Our Quest with a contribution.


Here  you will find our business plan.

Here is our account on  Google+

The EWT is ready for pre order here: EWT-Digital.com

story_txt:
Oh hey there friends!
 Thanks for stopping by my “awkwardly desperate plea for donations towards
a rerun of my project”, or ADPfDTaROMP for short. 
Some time ago, I was home,
alone listening to music, and thought to myself: - Gotta create a
classic, Gotta do it in an attic…
and so I did!In a concerted effort to delay
becoming a homeless layabout who lives and sleeps on the
streets , I am attempting to restart
my career by creating a product that everyone will learn to love, a product
everyone will find hard to live without,  a product I have engineered.
The first croudfunding project
I created, “Plan A”, Did not go according to plan...              Noo, not the funky chicken, although.... that is an idea to consider... Anyway, failing sucks, but it's better than the alternative, which is not trying. So, here I am again with “Plan B”. The idea was first developed
by McLaren, who had some similar, custom made toolboxes, for their factory.  And the great American manufacturer Craftsman also has a similar "High End" toolbox with subwoofer and a elevating screen.Source:http://gfwilliams.net/a-trip-to-the-mclaren-factory-2/We just went quite a few steps up from that idea. We are now in the stage of manufacturing called research in which we choose suppliers, test hardware, and plan a launch schedule.
Now you may be asking
yourself, “(insert your name here), I am a high powered (insert occupation).
 Why should I, (insert name again,) give Filipe and his staff my hard
earned money, just to enable his naïve, pie in sky, dreams of someday possibly
being a neurotic, out of work and suicidal engineer?”  Which is, in all
honesty, a valid, but pretty harsh question.  Take it easy man, we are
just trying here.  Brilliant ideas don’t make companies successful; the people who execute those ideas do.
Here is the trajectory for the
project:
Step 1 – Raise money
Step 2 – Do an extensive testing program
Step 3 – Spread the word
online and offline
Step 4 – Various "Hollywood style"
wheelings and dealings
Step 5 – Take the workshop
world, by storm. 
In all seriousness, starting an
entrepreneur project is something about which we are extremely passionate.
 Over the last few years, the internet has become an amazing medium for
aspiring entrepreneurs to gain notice from every industry.  Many people in
all aspects of product creation have started from a simple twitter feed, and I feel with my past
experience and the talented people I have around me, I have created a product,
that will get the name of our company out there.  
So, without further delay,
here is our project:
Presume unalike!!! And think outside the box (see what I did there ?)
                                                  "Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication."                                                      Leonardo da VinciRui Galvão Soares, one of our team membersThe Extreme Workstation Toolbox starts off where the original stopped. This visionary idea coming to life... will change the way you use a toolbox, forever!!Visionary people face the same problems everyone else does. But, they commit themselves to finding alternative solutions.EWT-Digital, is the logical toolbox solution, for every car workshop. It is the ultimate solution and, will help bring your business into the 21st Century.So, what makes our product so good?1. Delivers on a singular value proposition in a world-class way2. Simple, intuitive, and anticipates needs3. Exceeds expectations4. Changes the user's life for the betterUntil now no-one has taken much time and effort, to research, and understand the workshop tools market, and how it could be improved, in a highly desirable way, using technology. We have significant experience in the design, delivery, and implementation, of high technology systems. In addition, we have complete understanding of the needs and desires, around the unique workshop market world.Car Workshops can no longer thrive with old strategies in today’s multi-dimensional industry cycle. There are five strategic factors to consider: 1. Re-think the workshop  model 2. Drive tighter connections between your workshop and the digital world. 3. Elevate the in-workshop experience 4. Reboot the diagnostic process 5. Challenge traditional organizational structureDon’t Tweak Your workshop Rethink It End to End                           To help drive profitable growth, we urge mechanics, engineers to completely rethink the workshop format and proactively shift to a new end-state; one that plays a distinct and relevant role given the new automotive configuration, maintenance and repair behaviors and tools, that are here to stay.Computerized cars and standardized interfaces have been a benefit, for auto mechanics and manufacturers worldwide. Thus the time has come to rethink their approach, to retool. and to use new, specific methods and strategies.To quote  Werner Huber from BMW about their BMW i3 electric car that can autonomously park itself : "We appreciate what Google is doing since they’re promoting the idea of the autonomous car and preparing the ground for us,” said Huber. “But we are coming at it from another side. As a car manufacturer, we are very experienced in building cars and we have to adopt more processes of an IT company.”  (http://www.thedrum.com/news/2015/01/08/car-brands-closing-disconnect-between-mobile-experiences-and-driving)With our Extreme Workstation our clients will have all their charts, tables, testing software , internet and all the tools they may need, in one place. Covering all these needs the Extreme Workstation comes complete with a set of distinct and ever-important features, such as:High Definition Large Screen (also available optional touch screen) USB ports (to allow you to connect your interfaces and any other gear you may need) Power plugs, for every need (mains, usb and 12v supply)Wireless keyboard and mouse Our main goal is to create an affordable toolbox with built in, windows based computer. No more need for a computer and a toolbox. But we have tailored options for every need: A (removable) professional portable computer, connected by a docking station. With this feature you will be able to connect your computer at your workshop as you arrive, take it home afterwords and, next day, connect it at the Extreme Workstation Toolbox, at the race track Pit Box. More affordable models will have their own built in computer We will have other models with multi screen and multi computer capability.The Extreme Workstation Toolbox is a must for any workshop. Your measurements and/or analysis  take place in front of you on a large screen.                                   There will be no more need to work on your lap.                            The large screen will allow you to see every small detail of your schematics and/or measuring software even if you are sitting in a nearby car or near its engine.                 Begin your journey now.With this never-before-seen Toolbox, your workshop will enter the future.Ever hear about a unique business or invention -- something so obvious, you slap yourself on the forehead and say "Now why didn't I think of that?"That's what EWT-Digital, is all about -- Simple, yet innovative ideas that just make sense.                                    
We start by inviting you to crowdfund the first step of our
journey. In return, we will be providing you with access to the inner workings
of a work force team from its early days of development, revealing information
that is normally a closely guarded secret,  
We are offering you the potential, of being
involved, of getting the feedback and the inner stories. 
Make sure you are ready to embark on this journey. The Extreme Workstation
Toolbox aims to reach the ultimate dream, wich is
to have its place on every major workshop arround the world, even reaching the
motor racing world, and many other exciting places.  One of the reasons that the workshops are going to benefit so much from our services is due to the ability to collect
and analyze data on a global scale.

The
Extreme Workstation Toolbox will appeal to many groups of people, who are interested in cars,
fans, drivers and engineers. We are going to provide them unrivalled access to our
team. Our EWT-Digital WebPage, a knowledge-sharing and e-learning portal
will bring you closer to the action, and will allow you to learn and develop your
own skills in the car world, whether you are an amateur or a professional.
By
creating this new Extreme Workstation and and by using the "world of the
Internet", we will bring the Car World
closer together.
Your
help will give us all the chance to be part of the team from the start. We will
create a large community and we will start to see the power of a collective
force that will attract the funds and partners to make this journey a success.
Come and join us, help us create a piece of history.

We will start with a humble engineering workshop in Portugal,
to go on and "dominate" the world. 
We are recreating the tool box and its use. We are
creating a product that will be "The choice" of all of the new generation top engineers
and car technicians in the world.
The money from the first phase of crowdfunding, will be used
to build a more simplified version of the final product, bringing together, the
elements that are required for you to follow, and contribute, towards our early
progress. From then on, it turns into a much more engaging and powerful goal.
Interact
with us                            
Members of EWT-Digital, will interact and contribute towards
collaborative decisions, in a way no company has attempted before. We
will share everything from our search for the best componentes, right up to the
first work bench build, tested and delivered. This toolbox will become the gateway for live telemetry, measuring, and diagnostic, giving
the major contributors a behind-the-scenes glimpse of the idea involved here.
Major contributors, will have remote access, live camera feed to the machine,
and will be able to work with it "on spot".
Our online page will include modules such as:
· 
Understanding the car and advice around set-up  
· 
Developing a creative mentality
· 
Media training
· 
Advice from experts
· 
Suggested ideas from specialists
·  As
well as debriefs when we are testing and diagnosingThere will be a Cloud service with a number of specific related apps at the members disposal
We will
gather people with a lot of experience. This is your chance to get the same
kind of insight, that helped them reach the top.
How your money will be spentYour Contributions will go directly to the hardware, software, location, tools, licensing, website creation/administration, administrative costs, advertising, communications, transportation, shipping & mail basically to get this Project off of the ground.We also aim to have a Toolbox in place, at Autodromo do
Estoril. Major companies (including prestigious F1 teams, who come here often for tests) will be able to use it and “test drive it” on spot. (with multi screen and multi computer capability):            
·  Makes long-term client more likely and
more sustainable
·  Makes sponsorship more attractive to brands
·  Involves fans more than ever before
To put it simply, the more we raise, and the more people
who show their support, the sooner we can develop, the The Extreme Workstation
Toolbox and go places with it
We will provide you with:
·  The front-end of the new EWT-Digital portal
·  Provide you with the ability to watch and
contribute to the team’s initial stages of development
·  The ability to vote and interact on certain
team decisions from the offset
·  Video, written and audio updates, from
the team .
·  A comprehensive prospectus, that will allow us
to go after the next big investment, required to take this idea worldwide, and
make it part of every major workshop arround the world
Stretch Goals
Once we have passed the initial €25.000 target, we can start to
progress the next phases, without requiring additional investment straight away.
When we reach a total of €25,000 we will be able to start
building and creating, more complex experiences straight away, and create the back-office of the team

·  Later, we will look for additional
investment, so we can source our factory, and assembly line.

Show Support
If you would like to simply show support, for The Extreme Workstation
Toolbox, and keep up-to-date, with our progress, you can invest
just one pound. You won’t be participating in the experiences we have lined up,
but your contribution helps confirm to our investors that we’re onto a good
idea.Why share our secrets?
When people hear about The Extreme Workstation Toolbox, they
ask? Why we are happy to give away our secrets, to our competitors. There are two
reasons, transparency gets rid of barriers, that often create disharmony in
a team and, promotes even greater creativity. secondly, if your competitors
can only win, by chasing your tail, then they won’t be able, to hold pace for
very long.
Our new Extreme Workstation Toolbox challenges
the current thinking of what a Toobox should be, and modernises the
fan/sponsor relationship. With the birth of the web, and social media, the world
communicates differently, resulting in a change in the way people interact, and
receive their information. This "world of ideas", is starting to catch up, but we
feel, it’s ready to go a step further.
In essence, we’re proposing a new model for manufacturing,
one where transparency, and free-flow of information, works to the benefit of the
team, and the benefit of the participating individuals.
We already have several requests for the product, all we need is make it a reality:

                                               



“Please email me more information on the product” - Eric Min“What is the cost and do you have representation in Brasil” - Claudio Sousa“You have like this ?” - Bob G Bitar“We are in the main busines of auto repair tools, we can provide you with measuring tools, and maybe you can provide us with your products” - Linda Li“Can you send to Venezuela? and what are the costs ?” - Enmanuel Rodriguez“I love your product, do you have representation in Brasil ?” - Romeri Cunha SilvaThese are just a few examples...Help us make The Extreme Workstation Toolbox a reality!As with all projects, success is only possible, when you overcome potential challenges.                                        The most important thing, is that people show their support, by participating in the campaign, however they can. An investor would like to see huge uptake, before they put serious money, into funding a project like ours. Even a one pound donation, will show other supporters, you believe this is a good idea, whatever your financial situation. As such, your one pound, will go a long way in creating history.If you can not contribute, we understand. But you can still help. Share, blog, tweet, comment, post, chat...               The reality is, The Extreme Workstation Toolbox, is a highly effective tool. Clients with EWT-Digital, will be able to make analysys, and testing in a complete new way. Each user of The EWT-Digital Toolbox, will have a unique product, tailored to his/her spacific needs. And even being able to use dedicated Cloud Computing services in a near future.About the Cloud

computing is the future but not only for hosting, it is becoming the way we
compute. The way businesses operate, due to the crescent number of applications

computing is helping many businesses with all the great tools and technology
that was only available to big enterprises with a ton of money.               
Even if you
don't know what cloud computing is, chances are you could be already using it on a day-to-day basis. Do you use
Gmail, or Dropbox, or Google Drive, or iCloud, or any of the millions of websites
that run on a cloud server? 
You are just
enjoying all the benefits of cloud computing. To think about the capabilities
of this technology. One can only speculate how cloud computing is going to

story:
Jinsley is the next stage in the smart sunglasses revolution. Design to protect your eyes whether you’re out in the sun or staring at a screen, these convenient foldable glasses leverage advanced technology to filter our harmful light and rays in the most stylish and functional way possible.

Indoor anti-blue light
These smart sunglasses with an advanced anti-glare coating to boot. Indoors, automatically change the color of the lens to turn on the blue light protection mode.

Outdoor UV protection
When outdoors, Jinsley automatically transforms into sunglasses to protect the eyes from ultraviolet rays.

Jinsley knows where you are before you do. These smart sunglasses intelligently detect your environment and change color depending on whether you’re inside or out, with an advanced anti-glare coating to boot. Block out sunlight or blue light and protect your eyes no matter what’s on the day’s agenda.

Outdoors automatically change color, the lens is as bright as a mirror, which effectively prevents ultraviolet rays, protects the eyes, and will not be looked directly into the eyes like other lenses.

Because of Jinsley's foldable design, its frame is very flexible and can create a variety of shapes.

Jinsley proves you don’t have to sacrifice fashion for function, or vice versa. With these smart babies in your pocket, you can whip them out anytime and instantly boost your street cred with sleek shades that are just as fashionable as they are functional and practical. We’ve spent years refining our design, paying deep attention to detail to bring you shades you’ll fall so deeply in love with, you’ll never want to take them off.

Jinsley adopts electroplated metal frames, which are sturdy and durable, stylish and fall-resistant.

 

Jinsley adopts membrace lense. Even if the lense is stained with dust or fingerprints, you only need to wipe it lightly, and the lense can be clean.

What’s yourJinsleyflavor? Choose from square or round frames for a look that’s just as unique as you are.Discover unique styles designed for both male and female preferences, suitable for any facial shape. But no matter which frame, shape, style or design you choose, one thing is guaranteed – a delicate, elegant look that will enhance your aesthetic no matter where life takes you.

Crafted using high-quality metal, your Jinsley smart foldable glasses will last far longer than any other cheap plastic sunglasses could dream of. A dust-free electroplating metal frame, accompanied by tough reinforced screws and a unit-body design, make for easy folding and quality you’ll enjoy for years to come.

 

Zhanpeng Smart Glasses Co. ltd. is established in 2011, focus on glasses business for 10 years. Our headquarter is in Shenzhen, Guangdong, own the Jinsley brand. We are a large optical enterprise integrating R&D, manufacturing and marketing of glasses and accessories which has its own R&D institute, manufacturing base, material supply chain and sales center. At the moment, we have more than 1000 incumbent employees.

story:
Leafboard Plus comes with 4 detachable modules: deck body, battery module, control module and the motor, you can replace the modules easily in just simple steps.  

With the mature design and reasonable layout,  the smart modular system greatly improves the stability when you are riding on Leafboard Plus Skateboard. What’s more, it makes maintenance and upgrades more easier that everyone can replace the accessories in several simple steps.

The smart modular system can protect you and your Leafboard Plus not only from overheat, overtension, overcurrent, short circuit but also motor stalling from disconnection and low battery sliding.
 

With a 5000mAh built-in battery & high-power motor, Leafboard Plus reaches the range of 12.4 miles, speeds up to 32km/h, and it easily climbs inclines along your daily route. 

 

  • Fast Speed up to 32km/h
     
  • Long Range of 12.4 Miles

 

  • Climbs Inclines up to 20%

 

  • Dual Direction Slectable

 Leafboard Plus is designed with the unique reverse function. It's easy to move forward and backward for more options and more fun!

 

  • 3 Modes

Leafboard has 3 riding modes for a perfect ride in any situation. 

 

  • The Most Reliable & Intuitive Remote Control

Based on the previous wooden series by Leafboard, we spent a lot of time and energy on redesigning the remote and control module to ensure fantastic control and stability when riding Leafboard Plus. 

2.4GHz wireless connection greatly improves the stability of the remote control, and effectively reduces the risk of unwanted disconnections from the board. With 0.9 inch OLED screen, you’ll always find the information of speed, battery level and direction.
 

 

  • Water Resistant

With an IP56 waterproof rating, you can ride Leafboard Plus through damp streets or rainy weather without worry. 

 

  • Regenerative Braking

Leafboard Plus is equipped with a smart braking system that provides safe, smooth stops.

 

  • Night Warning Light

It's useful for traffic safety at night and day.

 

Lightweight, ultrathin, Leafboard plus is super convenient to take you to anywhere.

 

  • Leafboard Backpack

With a compact size of 25 x 9.5 x 5 inch, Leafboard plus weighs only 10.5 lbs and the thinnest deck body is only 17.8mm. Leafboard Plus comes with a stylish backpack so it’s easy to carry your Leafboard Plus anywhere, anytime.

 

  • Your Portable Charger

Leafboard Plus has a USB outlet to charge a phone or mobile device anytime you need.  

 

BOARD  SPECS

  •  Size: 25*9.5*5 inch  /635*241*127mm
  •  Thickness: 17.8mm /0.7inch 
  •  Weight: 4.8 kg/10.58lbs
  •  Deck Materials: Canadian maple + Fiber glass + Carbon fiber 
  •  Wheel Size: 72*43mm

 

TECHNICAL SPECS 

  •  Top Speed: 32 km/h (tested with one 74kg rider) 
  •  Range: 12.42miles /20 km
  •  Battery : 5000mah Lithium-polymer battery (1000+ times charge cycles)
  •  Charger : 3A quick charge, fully charged in 70mins 
  •  Remote Control: 2.4G wireless connection
  •  Remote Braking : FOC Braking 
  •  Motor : 2000 W



 


Development in Progress & Shipment on Time

With the precious experience of our previous Kickstarter campaign, we are more capable of dealing many challenges that we met in the last campaign 2 years ago, such as manufacturing, shipping... We know how to successfully deliver Kickstarter pledges as well as providing helpful after sales service.  

The Leafboard Plus production and manufacturing have been going smoothly, and some of the accessories were successfully manufactured at the current status.
story_txt:
Meet the new Leafboard Plus electric skateboard! On the one hand, with modular, ultra-thin, lightweight, and powerful design, it is convenient  for your daily commute.You will never worry about crowd traffic jam. On the other hand, no matter you are a beginner or a pro, you will gain so much fun when riding this stable and flexible Leafboard Plus. Believe it or not ,if you have a dog,  both of you will enjoy the ride!After our first Kickstarter campaign, we have received many valuable feedback and suggestions that kept us moving forward to make a next generation electric skateboard with more upgraded features at an affordable price: Leafboard Plus.  
 
  Leafboard Plus comes with 4 detachable modules: deck body, battery module, control module and the motor, you can replace the modules easily in just simple steps.  With the mature design and reasonable layout,  the smart modular system greatly improves the stability when you are riding on Leafboard Plus Skateboard. What’s more, it makes maintenance and upgrades more easier that everyone can replace the accessories in several simple steps.The smart modular system can protect you and your Leafboard Plus not only from overheat, overtension, overcurrent, short circuit but also motor stalling from disconnection and low battery sliding. 
 
 With a 5000mAh built-in battery & high-power motor, Leafboard Plus reaches the range of 12.4 miles, speeds up to 32km/h, and it easily climbs inclines along your daily route.  
Fast Speed up to 32km/h 
 Long Range of 12.4 Miles 
 Climbs Inclines up to 20% 
 Dual Direction Slectable Leafboard Plus is designed with the unique reverse function. It's easy to move forward and backward for more options and more fun! 
 3 ModesLeafboard has 3 riding modes for a perfect ride in any situation.  
 
 The Most Reliable & Intuitive Remote ControlBased on the previous wooden series by Leafboard, we spent a lot of time and energy on redesigning the remote and control module to ensure fantastic control and stability when riding Leafboard Plus. 2.4GHz wireless connection greatly improves the stability of the remote control, and effectively reduces the risk of unwanted disconnections from the board. With 0.9 inch OLED screen, you’ll always find the information of speed, battery level and direction. 
 
 
With upgraded  power capacity（upgrade from 300mah to 400mah）the remote has gained longer standby, and you do not need to worry about longer trip. 
 Water ResistantWith an IP56 waterproof rating, you can ride Leafboard Plus through damp streets or rainy weather without worry.   
 Regenerative BrakingLeafboard Plus is equipped with a smart braking system that provides safe, smooth stops. 
 Night Warning LightIt's useful for traffic safety at night and day.  
 
We strive for perfection in every step of our skateboard and want to deliver the best electric skateboard to everyone. With dedicated design, assembling, and package, we believe you will love the Leafboard Plus. If you want to ride with your dog, Leafboard Plus will bring more fun for you! 


Leafboard Plus is not only an electric skateboard, but a very playful skateboard. Considering different skill level of each backer, the bushings are with higher hardness for more stable ride during high speed. The performance of Leafboard Plus will reach the best level after replacing the original bushings to the 85A hardness double-column bushings. For pumping and carve movements, you will enjoy so much fun and flexibility with Leafboard Plus.  



 
 Lightweight, ultrathin, Leafboard plus is super convenient to take you to anywhere. 
 Leafboard BackpackWith a compact size of 25 x 9.5 x 5 inch, Leafboard plus weighs only 10.5 lbs and the thinnest deck body is only 17.8mm. Leafboard Plus comes with a stylish backpack so it’s easy to carry your Leafboard Plus anywhere, anytime. 
 
 Your Portable ChargerLeafboard Plus has a USB outlet to charge a phone or mobile device anytime you need.   
 
 BOARD  SPECS
 
 Size: 25*9.5*5 inch  /635*241*127mm
 Thickness: 17.8mm /0.7inch 
 Weight: 4.8 kg/10.58lbs
 Deck Materials: Canadian maple + Fiber glass + Carbon fiber 
 Wheel Size: 72*43mm
 TECHNICAL SPECS 
 Top Speed: 32 km/h (tested with one 74kg rider) 
 Range: 12.42miles /20 km
 Battery : 5000mah Lithium-polymer battery (1000+ times charge cycles)
 Charger : 3A quick charge, fully charged in 70mins 
 Remote Control: 2.4G wireless connection
 Remote Braking : FOC Braking 
 Motor : 2000 W

 
  Development in Progress & Shipment on TimeWith the precious experience of our previous Kickstarter campaign, we are more capable of dealing many challenges that we met in the last campaign 2 years ago, such as manufacturing, shipping... We know how to successfully deliver Kickstarter pledges as well as providing helpful after sales service.  The Leafboard Plus production and manufacturing have been going smoothly, and some of the accessories were successfully manufactured at the current status.  
 
 
The  Leafboard Plus will be fully assembled when we ship the orders. So you can enjoy your ride with it once open the box! 


 
 
With much experience gained in designing and manufacturing skateboard, Leafboard team pursues to develop technically advanced products with superior quality.After the first campaign of  Leafboard Special, we have received many cherish feedback from our backers. When we decided to develop Leafboard Plus, we have taken all the aspects into consideration and we finally make it!
Our team also participated the ISPO Exhibition in Munich in January. At the exhibition, our products have gained a lot of good comments and people just loved them, especially our Leafboard Electric skateboard! They just enjoyed a lot in skating the first generation!  
 

 
FAQ
About The Shipment
 We promise that most of  the orders will ship before 15th  December. If you order earlier, you may receive it before Christmas.  Make sure your order is finished before 15th of November!
The Warranty of Leafboard  Plus
The warranty period is 180 days. From the date of receipt of Leafboard Plus, If quality issues occur during the warranty period (non-human damage), we provide replacement parts free of charge, customers only need to pay the shipment fee. If the quality issues are caused due to improper use or is beyond the warranty period , the replacement part and shipment will be charged from customers’ side. Due to our modular design,the shipment fee will be reduced greatly and is also a money saver.
The Maximum Weight
110KG
Can I  Take Leafboard Plus on Airplane?
Different countries and different airlines have different shipping standards for products with batteries. It is recommended to consult the selected airlines firstly to get an authoritative answer. (Our skateboard battery is 110WH, which can be used as a reference when consulting airlines.) The backers who used our skateboards brought skateboards to the aircraft before.
 
Does Leafboard Plus Has Any Age Advice?
Our electric skateboards are suitable for all ages. The board surface is really stable when you are riding.  First gear is best for novice players (maximum speed of 12km/h) to help you get familiar with our skateboards as quickly as possible. For experienced players, you can choose the second gear (maximum speed of 22km/h) or third gear (maximum speed 32km/ h) to get faster speed. Note! Our electric skateboards may be faster than you might expect.
Risk and Challenge
This is our second campaign,and our Leafboard Plus is not just the concept but the real product that we are producing. Most of the parts are under production. We promise to try our best to deliver the Leafboard Plus to every backer in time!
Meanwhile, we will post our progress and development in a timely and transparent manner! If you have any questions, we will get back to you ASAP.
Thank you for supporting us!

story:
Our mission is to connect you to amazing exclusive discounts, offers and adventures around the world! It does't matter if you're at home, traveling to London, Edinburgh or even on holiday in Spain, Mexico, Greece, France....  you can use our services anywhere. 

With just our product you can get access to exclusive offers in every country we operate around the world.

We have among our partnerships: National Restaurant Chains, Theme Parks, Nightclubs/Bars, Outdoor Activity Centres, Scuba Diving, Museums, you name it! 

Our offers are all unique, from 2 For 1 admission at a water park to 25% your food bill at a restaurant, FREE entry at Nightclubs to a HALF PRICE Jet Ski Tour. 

We want to update and grow our service  to enable users to save money on travel and experiences. If you are a backpacker, student or just on family vacation, you can benefit from our services, normally making your money back after one use. 

Our service cost a yearly fee of between £8-10, you will receive a physical card and have access to our phone applications (these will be self authenticating and stand-alone, just incase you lose your card).

 

 

We need help in funding the initial launch of our services. We have done a lot of hard work in the past year working with venues and businesses, signing  them up to be part of our amazing product. We now just need a help over the final hurdle. 

We have some pretty awesome perks to give away, that are all exclusive to our crowdfunder here on Indiegogo. 

We also are offering some superb opportunities to be part of Love It Guide in a digital and business capacity, so stay tuned. 

 

 

The main challenge we face is physically launching our product, finalising our iPhone/Android application and producing business and customer based materials.

Such things that seem inexpensive but soon add up... 

  • Web and App Integration 
  • Phone Application Live Location Database 
  • Launch Packs for all our 500+ plus venues. 
  • Production of the Love It Card  

Our new and improved website is looking awesome! this will launch in August. It will include the listings of our current discounts, interactive maps, customer ratings and tonnes of exclusive Love It content.

We hope to also use our collective crowd funding to grow our partnerships in our current locations, giving our users a greater variety of venues and offers to choose from. 

After we launch, it will be our ongoing goal to expand our services to include additional countries, while continuing to grow in our current areas. We will make sure our customers are never missing out and any amazing destinations.

 

 

If you can't contribute, it doesn't mean you can't help. Please feel free to share our funding page with all your friends. 

We always have amazing original content that we share on our Facebook and Instagram pages, It would mean as much as funding us if you could follow. like and share our content. 

 

Don't hesitate to contact us if you want more information or simply want to chat. If you know of any businesses that wish to be part of love it guide, tell them to get in touch with us.

story:
Who are We

 

We are Jason and Kimberly Perrins, founders of N’TICE-Teachers International Cottage Experience.  We love to travel, have been greatly enriched through our adventures and want all educators to have the same opportunity. 

While on the road, we have been able to eliminate the cost of overnight accommodations by staying at the places of other teachers around the world.  N'TICE unites educators globally, who share their places of stay, affording them the same privilege.   

In addition, a portion of all membership fees to this exclusive community will support a foundation, giving resources to education to accelerate the advancement of learning.

 

Why the Campaign

 

We are seeking $150,000 to complete the N'TICE website.

 

Members will choose one of three different lodging packages: Platinum, Gold or Silver.  For $399.00 a year, a platinum member may book unlimited stays anywhere in the world with no additional costs. 

A gold member for $249.00 a year, may book unlimited stays in his/her region plus an adjoining region of choice, also with no additional costs. 

Finally, at $175.00 a year, a silver member may book stays in his/her country again with no additional costs.

 

 

We gladly welcome contributions from both educators and non-educators alike.  N'TICE is exclusive to this community, but you do not have to be a teacher to back the campaign.

If you are not a teacher but are interested in improving education, you may back the campaign with a simple cash donation.  In addition if you would like to show appreciation to an educator or educators of your choice, you may also gift one of the following perks to him or her.  

 

1. Silver Lodging Package: One-year membership for

  $87.50  (%50 savings)

 

2. Gold Lodging Package: One-year membership for

  $124.50 (%50 savings)

 

3. Platinum Lodging Package: One-year membership for

$199.50 (%50 savings)

 

While an educator will be considered a full member upon joining N'TICE, that one year subscription period will not begin until said member uses the website to book the first stay, respecting the fact that some may not be able to travel for a given period of time.

All funds from this campaign will go towards completion of the website.   Once complete, it will allow each registered member to pay the minimal annual fee, list a property to share and enjoy unlimited access to overnight accommodations worldwide with no additional costs. 
 
 

In addition, we highly value the importance of education and want to give back. A portion of each membership fee will support the N'TICE Education Foundation, bringing resources to schools, providing scholarships to students and professional development to staff. The foundation will work to improve conditions in third world countries only.

 

The Impact of N'TICE on Pupils, Teachers & Community

 

What happens when a teacher connects their travels to the subject matter they teach?  Students will be drawn into the excitement of the adventure, better than any ordinary textbook.  Travel imparts a strong passion for places seen and experiences had. The more excited and enthusiastic the teacher is, the more likely students will also feel that zeal. 

Travel also provides countless ways to learn new things and gain new experiences. It can also be awkward and uncomfortable at times. When we travel we are no longer the masters of our domain. Travel serves as a reminder of what it’s like to be a student.  Educators can use this perspective to benefit their teaching and build empathy with their learners.

Understanding cultural differences and approaching pupils within a broader global context can help break down barriers of communication between teachers and students.  The more globally-minded a teacher is, the better the interchange with his or her class.

It is important that teachers have a world perspective in order to create a safe and stimulating classroom environment for all students based on proper communication.  The more well-travelled a teacher is, the better their students will be able to learn from them.

N'TICE will allow teachers to network with educators around the world to share trade techniques and classroom pedagogy.  

Finally, travel replenishes the spirit and rejuvenates the soul-making the teacher more effective when not on recess. 

 

      Other Ways You Can Contribute

       

      As N'TICE prepares to open the world of travel to educators, it will also provide its backers with the best travel experiences possible.  You'll connect with local hosts across the world who can share their knowledge about good eats and traditional cuisine, exciting activities, money-saving shopping tips and top rated places to visit while you are on the road. 

      To make this happen we encourage backers to connect with the N'TICE community by clicking on the corresponding links to our Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Linked-In pages. 

      For us sharing is caring, and we need all the support we can get building a trusted community of travel enthusiastic educators.   You can help us achieve our purpose and spread the joy by sharing our campaign and social media pages. 

       

       

      Get ready.  The bell has rung.  It's time for recess.  Travel more.  Spend less.

story:
Meet newest version of  MyKee. The revolutionary patented titanium multi-tool key designed for the utilitarian, now with more added functionality. MyKee makes for a great companion. 

When we started drafting a design for the new MyKee we wanted it to standout. Our idea of a perfect product is one that is stylish but yet doesn't compromise functionality. MyKee 2.0 is the perfect representation of our ideology. It's designed to fit wide range of personalities and activities. 

No matter the task, MyKee is built to last. Just like the original MyKee, we used Grade 5 Titanium to achieve a perfect weight to strength ratio. You can even take dive, as titanium is highly resistant to corrosion. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We're continuously working on improving our products and their functionality. By introduction of proprietary shape in the key ring hole (Key Connector), we're able to develop add-on tools that will be available in the near future. We have an example phillips bit below that showcases how it will be utilized. We're just scratching its surface and we believe we can further introduce wide range of functionalities that will make MyKee 2.0 very unique. Key Connector will also allow for different types of Folios that will have functionalities built in. Stay tuned as we proceed with our development of the add-ons. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Each MyKee is beautifully packed into a custom designed packaging that is simple, elegant and yet eco-friendly. 

 

 

 

Inspired by desire to design and create functional and elegant products , we pride ourselves on emphasizing on the importance of quality, expert craftsmanship and attention to detail while supporting local manufacturers with similar ideology.

story:
Thanks for checking out our project!  We are really excited to get this project off the ground.  It has been in the works for....well...all our lives.  

In case you didn't notice, we've contracted the fishing bug...thank goodness nobody has discovered a cure yet!!  Throughout our lives fishing the rivers, bays and lakes all over America, we have encountered one consistent problem: many of our fellow anglers are not fishing effectively. Traskbox has set out to fix that problem one angler at a time.

Whether a fly fisherman or a conventional gear fisherman, selecting the proper gear can be a formidable opponent. We know from personal experience that looking at a wall of flies, or an entire aisle of lures can be daunting. Our goal is to take some of that guesswork out of the process- allowing the angler to spend less time in the store and more on the water. 

A TraskBox subscriber will have the ability to log on to our website and build a simple profile telling us what kind of water they fish and what species of fish they are targeting.  We will then ship - TO THEIR DOORSTEP - a box of hand selected and hand tied fishing gear and lifestyle products that coincide with their profile.  We have teamed up with several fishing guides and industry professionals to make sure that each box is cutting edge and productive. 

The TraskBox team has designed each box to fit the needs of anglers of every level.  If the subscriber is a beginner, TraskBox will help get them introduced to the fundamentals of fishing. If they are an intermediate angler, TraskBox will supply them with gear that is cutting edge and productive.  If the TraskBox subscriber is an advanced angler, TraskBox will keep their fishing gear constantly stocked. The TraskBox team has also designed their boxes to be a great gift idea for people who have an angler in their life and just don't know what to get them.

The box options that TraskBox will offer for this project are:

The Madison Box- Fly Fishing Trout

The Clearwater Box- Fly Fishing Steelhead

The Original TraskBox- Conventional Gear Steelhead

The Columbia Box- Conventional Gear Salmon

Keep in mind, these are just examples. Telling someone what is in each box would spoil some of the fun!! Rest assured though, we have included love and quality in each box.

What we had in mind when creating TraskBox was making fishermen and women better at their sport.  So what we plan on creating is a community of knowledgeable anglers, who catch a ton of fish. Once this project is complete, the TraskBox team will continue to work tirelessly to increase their knowledge and pass that along to TraskBox subscribers through monthly gear and media on the website. 

Now choosing your fishing gear doesn't have to be a struggle. 

Thank you for your support!

Risks and challenges

The main risk is that we might lose our girlfriends because we have been doing so much R&D on the water! Seriously though....We are claiming that TraskBox will provide cutting edge, productive fishing gear, but there might be some subscribers out there who might still be confused when they get to the water with their new gear. Our plan for the future is- along side our pro staff anglers- to produce informative media such as instructional videos and a blog on our website. That way, any TraskBox subscriber who doesn't have our personal cell numbers can access helpful fishing information anytime!

Another challenge we have considered is the ability to maintain inventory and fulfill orders on time. With your support we can keep our facility stocked and fulfill our orders promptly!

story:
Short Summary

Youth development volunteer is teaming up with the local Association of Development in La Loma Parrita in Costa Rica to turn dreams into reality!

The popularity of skateboarding is growing each year here in Costa Rica. The people of Parrita, a city located on the Pacific coast of Costa Rica, have been awaiting and praying for a skate park for more than 3 years. 

In an effort to provide recreational spaces for youth and diminish high levels of vandalism, crime, and drug use the Association of Development is interested in building a skate park for the youth, with the youth. We are working with adolescents interested in the sport and leaders of this community to arrange this upcoming project. 

This project will be locally supported as well. The Association of Development has already donated a large piece of land for the purpose of this skate park. We are working to get local businesses to donate some of the materials and machinery. We will also be holding events to raise funds in both the community and the schools. 

The only thing we are missing?? YOU. We need your help to make this possible!  Please donate.

What We Need & What You Get

  •  This will be where the design and costs go. (still waiting on the design). $3,000 is our obtainable goal for getting started on the project. The design will likely show the cost being between $15,000 and 30,000. 
    • If we do not reach our goal, the funds that we have received will go into the bank account that is managed by the Association of Development specifically for the skate park. If we do not raise enough money to construct the entire skate park we will begin building in phases. We will use this money to start building the skate park.
  • Perks:  $100 and under: a personalized thank-you email expressing our utmost gratitude, $100+ a personalized thank-you card from one of the kids sent to your address with local coffee included! (the card and coffee will be sent when the campaign has completed) 
  • All contributors are welcome to come and participate in the construction of the skate park! Come see what you helped create! We will work towards offering all visitors lodging. 

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • This skate park will affect generations of youth in Parrita. This project has the potential to change lives. In  the canton of Parrita there is not much for adolescents to do in their free time. There is no movie theater, there is no ice cream shop, there is no community pool, there is no youth center.In a survey, 90% of youth answered that they spend their free time at home. This skate park offers an opportunity for both boys and girls to enjoy skateboarding, rollerskating, and bmx biking.  It offers an alternative to sitting on the couch and watching t.v. It offers an alternative to vandalism, delinquency, and drug use. 
  • This is a community project; from our small community to our region  to Costa Rica, to Central America, to the United States, to the World. Be a part of the global community. We are making ripples. Everyone is invited to partake.
  • We are an open book! We are available to answer questions and provide updates. 

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • The biggest challenge is finding the funding to build this skate park.
  • There is a risk that the skate park could become another location for people to use and sell drugs. We are not going to let this happen. The community organizations, churches, and youth are all dedicated to taking care of the park and ensuring that it is a safe place. 
  •  The Association of Development of La Loma Parrita is a group of highly dedicated individuals that care about their community, the youth, and sports. They recently completed constructing a huge 400m2 community gymnasium! This was a 3 year project with the financial support of national organization DINADECO. The ADI is also currently working on a project to provide lighting for the soccer field so that people can continue to play into the evening. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people are unable to contribute but there are other ways that you can help:
  • Please help get the word out!!!
  • PLEASE share this link with anyone and everyone! 
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
Short Summary Youth development volunteer is teaming up with the local Association of Development in La Loma Parrita in Costa Rica to turn dreams into reality!
The popularity of skateboarding is growing each year here in Costa Rica. The people of Parrita, a city located on the Pacific coast of Costa Rica, have been awaiting and praying for a skate park for more than 3 years. 
In an effort to provide recreational spaces for youth and diminish high levels of vandalism, crime, and drug use the Association of Development is interested in building a skate park for the youth, with the youth. We are working with adolescents interested in the sport and leaders of this community to arrange this upcoming project. 
This project will be locally supported as well. The Association of Development has already donated a large piece of land for the purpose of this skate park. We are working to get local businesses to donate some of the materials and machinery. We will also be holding events to raise funds in both the community and the schools. 
The only thing we are missing?? YOU. We need your help to make this possible!  Please donate.   What We Need & What You Get  
 This will be where the design and costs go. (still waiting on the design). $3,000 is our obtainable goal for getting started on the project. The design will likely show the cost being between $15,000 and 30,000. 
If we do not reach our goal, the funds that we have received will go into the bank account that is managed by the Association of Development specifically for the skate park. If we do not raise enough money to construct the entire skate park we will begin building in phases. We will use this money to start building the skate park. Perks:  $100 and under: a personalized thank-you email expressing our utmost gratitude, $100+ a personalized thank-you card from one of the kids sent to your address with local coffee included! (the card and coffee will be sent when the campaign has completed)

It offers an alternative to vandalism, delinquency, and drug use. 
This is a community project; from our small community to our region  to Costa Rica, to Central America, to the United States, to the World. Be a part of the global community. We are making ripples. Everyone is invited to partake.
We are an open book! We are available to answer questions and provide updates.     Risks & Challenges  People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.  The biggest challenge is finding the funding to build this skate park.
There is a risk that the skate park could become another location for people to use and sell drugs. We are not going to let this happen. The community organizations, churches, and youth are all dedicated to taking care of the park and ensuring that it is a safe place. 
 The Association of Development of La Loma Parrita is a group of highly dedicated individuals that care about their community, the youth, and sports. They recently completed constructing a huge 400m2 community gymnasium! This was a 3 year project with the financial support of national organization DINADECO. The ADI is also currently working on a project to provide lighting for the soccer field so that people can continue to play into the evening.     Other Ways You Can Help
Some people are unable to contribute but there are other ways that you can help:

Please help get the word out!!!
PLEASE share this link with anyone and everyone! 
Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Sky Solar Electric, together with our new partner at www.hybridpedals.com, is developing a range of modular solar/battery electric bikes and trailers that can be customized on-demand to meet your needs.

Our first two battery/Pedelec vehicles can each deliver up to 80 miles of pure electric range or up to 100 miles with some pedal assist. When combined with our next generation, high power and energy density solar PV semi-flexible modules, these solar electric bikes and power center trailers, deliver up to 180 miles of daily range, without plugging into the wall!

While riding or when parked, the solar power center trailer simultaneously recharges the optional second battery using only sunlight. This integrated solar bike and solar trailer, delivers a whopping 3600ah of daily long range power built upon a 48V platform that can hit speeds up to 40 MPH.

This Sky Solar Electric Bike / Trailer also powers a range of devices using both AC or DC electricity, while simultaneously being recharged by the sun with 210 watts of solar power. This 1000wh of daily power provides an additional 50 miles of daily range, even after fully draining the second 48V 20ah battery or the 678ah AC/DC power station!

Current Vehicle Options

  • 48V 1500W Mountain Bike w/ Hub Motor and Dual 14-34ah lithium battery(s)
  • 48V 750W Hybrid Bike w/ Mid-Drive Motor and Dual 14-34ah lithium battery(s)
  • 48V 1000W Mountain Bike with Hub Motor and Dual 14-34ah lithium battery(s)
  • 48V 1000W Foldable 26" Bike with Hub Motor and 48V 14ah lithium battery

Option 1 - Here is our latest rear wheel, 48V 1500W hub motor with 14ah primary battery and optional 20ah secondary battery that can be recharged using over 200W of lightweight PV via a hidden mobile power station on the quick release solar trailer!

Option 2 - Here is our second 48v Mid-Drive 750W Motor/Pedelec with optional210 watt Solar Electric Bike and Trailer! This bike was tested via multiple 45 mile commutes and performed flawlessly.

Option 3 - Our third bike is being designed to be less than 35 pounds total on a lightweight, aluminum/carbon fiber women's Trek frame that will incorporate a 1000W 48V mid-drive motor and 14ah battery with optional solar and trailer.  

Coming April

Option 4 - Lightweight foldable 26#, 48V 750W Ebike with optional solar and trailer

Coming May


E-Bike Components - Here is an overview of components we are using on these bikes:

Motor 1 - 48V 1500watt 26" Hub Wheel Motor with regenerative breaking and  cruise control

Motor 2 - 750W - 1000W Mid-Drive

High Amp Battery - High C 48V 20 ah LiPo battery with 60 amps of continuous power and 100amp peak power!

5"x5"x10.5" 48v - 20 ah battery (960wh) power brick!

48V 14ah Triangle Frame Mount Battery

48V 14ah Rear Rack Battery

Ultra Lightweight Solar Photovoltaics - High Energy and Power Density

UAV 60-80watt bi-facial solar panel weighing .7 kg

Our goal is to develop modular and powerful transportation systems designed to collect, store and propel you farther and to allow you the power to recharge a world of gadgets.

Dedicated LiPo battery charger and many possible battery configurations

This bike, I hope, will be able use only sunlight directly or store it to one or more power packs and to use them whenever or wherever they are needed to power anything, including bike entertainment systems and AC or DC gadgets!

35-45watt UAV bifacial solar panel - .4 kg

It may also be possible with an upgrade to be able to couple both battery packs and use solar energy at the same time to concur said hills! Adding a second hub wheel opens up further possibities for efficent integration and Direct SolarDrive systems!

Solar Electric Bike Trailor Option

A new iteration of our concept will add a separate, foldable solar electric power station to an award winning, under 10 pound detachable bike trailer/dolly to all you to hitch on a self-contained solar electric battery power station onto any bike, ride anywhere, park the bike, and use planes, trains and automobiles to take this power station/mobile cart anywhere, with plenty of storage to carry/load your things to take to and from the beach, store, home or office. This unique foldable trailer can even be stuffed in an overhead compartment on a plane and provide mobility to a bike box, solar electric entertainment system or even a foldable kayak!

Burley Travoy Trailer

Personal Background

For the last 20+ years I have been consumed by the power of combining the best solar energy films, energy density storage technologies and advanced nano materials.  

At previous jobs I led a clean energy consulting firm back in the early 90's and was Technical Director and lead researcher for a solar/battery powered high altitude airship (see below) project team that built a 190' x 60'x 42' aluminum framed blimp in 5 months and demonstrated it before US military, NASA and public investors with a goal to provide low cost communications to the developing world. 

Sanswire Stratellite High Altitude Airship Prototype

Currently, I am a lead for the local Go Green team at a large communications firm and outspoken proponent of saving money through cleantech investment and the concept of devices that can make you money capturing the sun's energy! I also assist in evaluation of company solar opportunities.

I want to set the example regarding what can be done with clean energy technologies, now and in the future. For the last nine years, I have also spent my spare time assisting and funding in the research and development of a highly agile, low altitude UAV invented by Daniel Geery, called the Hyperblimp - www.hyperblimp.com.

In 2010 I invested in a 5kw solar PV array with micro-inverters and solar thermal water heating system for my home, along with making all related energy efficiency investments. This investment met 70% of my home energy needs and paid for itself in 3 years, now yielding $2500 in yearly energy and SREC profits.

Having planned to also invest in the best available electric car, I decided that it would be more fun to start with a lightweight, high powered solar electric bike prototype that can meet daily transportation needs and be demonstrated at schools and events as an example that the clean energy future is already here.

Lightweight, Powerful and Flexible to meet on and off bike needs

The fun connected gadgets will also of course be added as we go to take advantage of the extra power that can be had from human and solar energy!


Current Plan

  • Build four unique and affordable solar electric bikes/kits that can be packaged and shipped to fit most bicycles around the world.
  • Use a relatively light, yet strong 26" Mountain Bike with 18 gears, front suspension and disc breaks and add a low drag mounting kit with up to 250w of 21% efficient SunPower Semi-Flexible Solar Panels.
  • Use a super light carbon fiber bike and add an equally lightweight solar/battery enabled power kit that can meet the needs of both women and men!
  • The mountain bike kits will include advanced mounting systems and between 125-250 watts of bifacial UAV grade flexible solar panels on the rear and front rack mounts.
  • It will also pair this solar kit with a rear and possibly front wheel Magic Pie 4th Generation 1500W / 20-48V Hub Motor, along with two 14-20ah / 48V batteries, unless higher energy density options are immediately available at reasonable cost.
  • Targeted performance goal is a top speed of at least 40MPH and 100-200 miles of range at a 25MPH cruising speed, but other configurations are possible.
  • Investigate the option to power bike with Solar Only or utilize the best hybrid approach to maximize total energy density and eliminate carbon footprint.
  • The platform goal is to enable users to use this extra solar juice on or off the bike, and the mounting kit will allow users to quickly and efficiently mount the Solar System anywhere.
  • Lower and wattage kits will also be possible, as will different hybrid packages to meet weight and distance needs.
  • Rigorously test completed bike kits prior to sale to public .
  • Go into volume production of turn key kits with the proceeds of this campaign, tapping volume discounts for partner suppliers and passing on the discounts to our supporters with the goal of shipping anywhere.

Current Target Specs

  • 48V 1500 Watt Magic Pie 4th Generation Rear Wheel Hub Motor or 1000Watt Mid-Drive Motor
  • Use LiPo Batteries with BMS and battery charger with 34 ah with projected 96 mile range (48Vx34ah/20 miles per hour = 80 mile range
  • Up to 250 watts of UAV grade solar panels with mounting grommets and a multi-functional carbon fiber racking system.
  • Solar charge controller / MPPT Solar tracking micro-inverter to increase energy collection and facilitate efficient use of solar output to power wheels, batteries and/or high tech electronics or audio system.

Mounting Design

  • Use lightweight, retractable, mounting system assembly to mount hard shell marine grade solar panels and potentially track the sun - on or off the bike.
  • Add aluminum or carbon front rack to mount 1-2 50 Watt solar panels
  • Mount 20ah-48V battery on rear rack, shaded by semi-flexible solar panel(s)
  • Mount one 14ah-12-48V battery on front triangle, shaded by semi-flexible solar panels

Other Potential Enhancements

  • Add front hub motor and drive directly off solar battery alone for short trips and to add switching capability to combine or engage main rear motor and battery.
  • Continued investigation into higher energy density technologies like Lithium Sulfur batteries, fuel cells with safe metal hydride storage, and super-capacitors, as available and affordable.
  • Engagement with carbon fiber manufacturers to further improve on initial lightweight aluminum Mounting system and develop turnkey solution
  • Upgrade with other carbon fiber components or lower profile options
  • Add simple solar tracking system to optimize solar collection.

Funding Request

Pre-sell best-of-breed Sky Bikes and Trailers with minimal markup to make it easy for everyone to Ride the Sun!
