story:
So, who are we?

Well, we’re Jazzmine and Manoj! A Canadian and Indian duo with a passion for social entrepreneurship, conscious consumption and sharing Rajasthani culture. We met at the beginning of 2015 while working for a grassroots NGO. Fast forward to 2018, we’re the best of friends and business partners, merging our loves for hospitality and tourism, social good and responsible consumption.

Hara House

Hara House is a zero waste guesthouse and social enterprise. We aim to impact the sustainability of the tourism industry, social entrepreneurship and conscious consumption in North India. Onsite at Hara House, engage with social good doers through our community hub, lounge in our rooftop cafe, engage in our weekly arts and culture events, or explore some of our community tourism activities in and around the city. 20% of all booking and tour profits are set aside for our Hara Innovation Fund, a grant fund for social entrepreneurs in our community with projects focused on education and environmental action.

Hara House is comprised of two dorm rooms (12 beds) and two private rooms, a community hub, rooftop restaurant and guest facilities including access to a kitchen, workspace and more.

Hara House is located in Purani Ginani, Bikaner, Rajasthan (yes, we’ve gotten a few laughs for the location’s name). It is a 7-minute walk from the entrance of Junagarh Fort, Rani Bazaar (the main, city market), and less than a 50 rupee’ auto rickshaw drive from Bikaner Junction.


Bikaner is one of the most exciting cities in Rajasthan, yet so many tourists overlook what it has to offer! From the majestic Jungarh Fort, to the beautiful Lalgarh Palace, to the Karni Mata Temple, home to over 25,000 sacred rats (!), Bikaner is a one-of-a-kind destination for traditional Rajasthani arts, culture and heritage. Try traditional Bikaner foods, visit wildlife sanctuaries, hundreds of havelis and ride off into the sunset on a camel on one of our overnight safaris in Chandasar village!

 

We’ll be hosting friends and family for our soft launch over October and November 2018. Join us for our official launch on New Year’s Eve by grabbing your New Year’s in Bikaner trip, an exclusive adventure offered through our Indiegogo campaign!

 

Through Hara House, we aim to influence locals and travelers to make responsible choices that impact social, economic and environmentally sustainability at home and abroad. 

Going Zero Waste

So, how do we do this zero waste thing? From reusing waste water to wash floors, to making natural soaps, to providing locally sourced food and produce from our organic farm. Our goal is to achieve a minimum of a 90% landfill diversion rate. We are doing this through implementing a strategic approach to eliminating waste and use of disposable products and packaging, and influencing locals and travellers to do the same. We are working with local partners invested and passionate about our love for hara to help ensure this happens.

 

Energy Consumption - our solar energy production heats our water (when needed in the winter months) and helps power our home. We aim to achieve a 100% solar produced guesthouse by 2021 (but preferably sooner!).

 

#NoPlastic - We do not purchase products that come in plastic packaging and provide reusable tote bags to all guests to eliminate the need for disposable bags while shopping.

 

Water Consumption - we encourage timed and bucket showers (although shower heads are available). See how much water you use via our wall metres in our shower rooms, and review your Hara Tips sheet while staying with us to understand how you can mitigate excessive water usage.

 

“Waste” Disposal - Compost right onsite to help our urban herb garden grow, and if recyclables are obtained throughout your stay, set them aside to empower local entrepreneurs selling recyclable waste to manufacturers, helping close the loop! When it comes to your personal “waste”,  you are welcome to use toilet paper provided onsite or opt-out and receive a complimentary bum towel! How fun, right?! Go Indian style and utilize our badet-style toilets for a squeaky, clean behind!

 

#CowPoopPower - biofuel is all the rage in India, and an exciting opportunity to minimize our carbon footprint. That’s why we’re keeping our tandoor 100% cow poop powered!

 

For our full zero waste strategy (a working document), send us an email at harahousebikaner@gmail.com! We’d be happy to share what we’ve developed and what we are working on.

Our Campaign

The house has been selected and the renovations have commenced! Help us renovate, hire staff, purchase our tools and equipment, and upcycled furniture and decor so we can host you starting December 28th, 2018! We’re in need of $10,000CDN (8 lakhs) to make this happen, and aim to raise an additional $5,000 to kickstart our Hara Innovation Fund, investing in social entrepreneurs working on projects that are positively impact the environment and education in North India.

 

By supporting our campaign, you are directly investing in the future of sustainable hospitality and tourism, and innovative projects helping develop the sustainable India of the future. During our campaign, purchase exclusive trips to experience North India and Rajasthan that include complimentary meals at our rooftop restaurant and goodies to help make your travels more environmentally friendly!

 

Our impact

Hara House will be the first zero waste property in North India! We hope to influence other forms of accommodation, restaurants and shopping centres targeting tourists and locals to become more conscious about their environmental impact by offering consulting and resources to do so. Through the Hara Innovation Fund, we are investing and consulting nonprofit and social entrepreneurs with projects located in North India focused on education and environmental action.

 

By the end of 2019, our first year of business, we aim to have provided funding, consulting and resources to 5 social innovation projects in North India.

Our current project partners include:

EduCARE India

We have partnered with EduCARE to assist with directing tourists to their community and volunteer tourism projects economically empowering rural families. We will also be stocking their ReStore items at Hara House made by local microfinance and women-run self-help projects in Rajasthan, Punjab and Himachal Pradesh. Other projects with the organization are currently in negotiation.

Doodlage

Doodlage upcycles textile waste from manufacturers in Delhi to create unique and trendy collections that positively impact the environment and your personal style. We aim to assist Doodlage with funding needed for educational pop-ups on ethical fashion, and assisting the organization with consulting and accessing resources to help make ethical fashion mainstream in India. Doodlage has created our 100% upcycled campaign shirts and totes and are the lead design team for Hara House!

 

Instead of competing, we’re collaborating. We value community among the various hospitality and tourism organizations in the city of Bikaner. By connecting travelers to these organizations, based on their needs, and working with businesses to implement more sustainable practices, we see a bright and green future for hospitality and tourism wherever hara goes.

 

Spread the Word!

Thank you for taking the time to learn about Hara House and our campaign! Be sure to like us on Facebook and follow along on Instagram. Share our Campaign on social media and we'll send you a virtual hug. Dhanyavad, friend!

 

FAQ

"How do I contact the team for specific perk questions?"

Email us at harahousebikaner@gmail.com

"Can I see a more in-depth itinerary for the New Years in Bikaner trip?"

Absolutely! Click here!

"What if I'm not visiting India until later than 2019? Can I still apply my stay to future travel?"

Absolutely! Once you've purchased your stay, we'll keep you on the books. You can book anytime after January 4th, 2019. Booking requests should be made at least 7 days prior to arrival.

"I'm a social entrepreneur or organization that wants to get involved with the community hub. What should I do?"

Send us an email about what you're up to at harahousebikaner@gmail.com! More details about our community hub will be online in the near future.

"I'm not a traveler but want to contribute a larger donation. How do I do this?"

Send us an email and we'll send you a private campaign link to contribute however much you'd like!

story:
the end of unproductive business travel

Travelling for work is increasingly becoming part of our lives, and as we all know, travelling and working is not the easiest task: it requires planning and lots of organisation. Everyone has experienced the hassle of having to take your laptop or working paper from the luggage in the overhead bin? Or being in an important meeting and having to open your luggage with your personal belongings to grab your laptop charger from inside? 

Jey&em ONE is born from the aim to simplify your travel. We want to provide you with a unique tool to be more efficient, organised and most importantly, create a luggage which adapts to your travel style and needs. 

With this goal in mind, we set out on a journey to Simplify your Travel.

 

Introducing Jey&em ONE: the unique carry-on luggage with click-on laptop case

We have created the first luggage to have a click-on laptop case at the front of the luggage. In simple words, ONE gives you the comfort of the carry-on luggage with the flexibility and practicality of the separate laptop case. 

In addition to its unique removable laptop case, ONE also includes a power bank, silent-run 360 spinners and Stability Tilt® technology, which are key to providing the best experience for you, the smart business traveller.

 

 

 

A carry-on luggage with click-on laptop case

Jey&em's revolutionary feature is the click-on laptop case, designed to carry your mobile office: your laptop, tablet, papers, cables, chargers and more.

Our unique click-on system uses highly reliable and secure magnetic fasteners from the German brand Fidlock™ .

Being able to detach the laptop case means you can at any time leave the "bulky" luggage in its designated area, but keep all of your mobile office by your side.
 

ONE, the carry-on luggage

ONE is a premium cabin sized luggage - approved by the majority of airlines - with light Polycarbonate/ABS shells, extra silent Japanese wheels and durable YKK zippers.

As the laptop case is detachable, it doesn't count as part of the luggage when checking the dimensions and weight.

 

The laptop case: BAG or SLEEVE

You can choose what suits you better.

With the BAG, you can have your full mobile office on the go.

The Bag has 2 compartments: a large one to fit a laptop (up to 15.4"), a book and some papers and a smaller compartment with internal divisions and an invisible front pocket for sensitive documents.

The BAG is made with a sleek and resistant Black TPR coated nylon fabric (waterproof), padded internal divisions and a semi-rigid rear shell that has the Fidlocks™ that click on the luggage.

 In addition, the BAG has a side handle to be carried as a briefcase. 

 

If you prefer to travel light with only the essentials, then the SLEEVE is the one for you.  

With a slimmer design, the SLEEVE has one main compartment for laptops up to 15.4"  and an elastic pocket for the charger and a book. 

The SLEEVE is made of neoprene with Grey Jersey lamination, and the semi-rigid rear with the Fidlock™ fixings.

 

Keep your things organised

The luggage and the laptop case have been carefully designed to offer you enough room for your belongings. Also there are different pockets and dividers to make sure your things stay well organised during your trip. 

 

Secure and Anti-theft

Having your laptop in the front of your luggage means it has to be safe and secure.

For that, we have implemented a special front TSA lock where you can lock your laptop case so it cannot be stolen or removed by mistake. 

On top of this, we also have Fidlock™: a German magnetic fastener that can hold in total over 50kg.

 

Charge on the go

To make sure you don't run out of battery on your smartphone we have added a power bank that fits in the handle of the luggage. It will give you up to 6 additional charges, and it's easily accessible.

The 10'000mah power bank is included in the luggage, and comes together with 3-in-1 USB cable (usb C, usb mini and lightning). 

It can also be placed inside the BAG or the SLEEVE, as there's special pocket for it. This way you can charge your tablet and phone on the go, without cables hanging everywhere.

 

 

Balance Tilt® for optimal stability

Jey&em ONE has a patented 5 degree inclination to compensate for the extra weight of your laptop case. Even with a fully packed laptop bag, your luggage will not tip over... it's soo satisfying!

 

Personalise your ONE luggage

We believe in responsible consumption and as so we would like ONE to be your travel partner that you will keep for a long time, not a disposable luggage. That is why we are offering the possibility of personalising your ONE luggage by having your name engraved on the metal plate at the back of the luggage. 

When pre-ordering your ONE luggage, please send us an email with the name you would like to appear at hello@jeyandem.com 

For companies and teams we offer the possibility of having your logo added to the rear plate.

 

Smooth, silent and long-lasting 

ONE is made to last, to endure miles and miles of travel.

That is why we chose only the best components for ONE. In particular Fidlock fastners, the Silent-run 360 spinners from the leading Japanese manufacturer Hinomoto, YKK zippers as well as premium PC-ABS shells for optimal strength and lightness. 

 

 

Designed by Sapetti

Jey&em ONE was initially ideated by Marc Sapetti, owner of the multi award design agency Sapetti. As an industrial designer and business traveller, he created a luggage that would solve issues he used to face during his business trips. His belief in the product made him embark in the journey of founding Jey&em, together with his partner "Jey".

 

 

 

If you would like to order larger volumes, please e-mail us so we can organise that. 

hello@jeyandem.com

 

Our timeline

We are here for the long run, Jey&em ONE is just the beginning of a Journey to Simplify your Travels. 

We are already working on new products and variants, such as the smaller and larger luggage versions, also new colours and new laptop cases. 

Credits: 

Branding by Duett Studio, Andorra

Art direction and photography by Creative Affairs, London

Photography technitian Alba Duque

Video Edition by João Franco

Design team at Sapetti: Marc Sapetti and Jonathan Medcalf

story:
Our Mission 

We are working to reuse and recycle as many materials that would be waste bound as possible. Whether it is by created product our of recycled, reusable, and biodegradable.  Whatever it takes! 

 

  • The SUS team is a team of everyday people  that have always wanted to be able to give back to the environment/planet around us.  

 

  • It takes everyone to help reduce waste that we create and put into landfills. This campaign is important to not only reuse materials that would end up as waste but also to limit new materials to be created 

 

  • Each time that you purchase our product you will be taking away the chance to have more waste going into landfills because our the materials we use for our product.Contributors will help us move forward with our goal to always use materials that can be recycle and limit our negative impact on the planet 

 

 

Why Contribute?

  • The funding will go to expanding our SUStainable product assortment both for our bags and our completely new apparel and will help to provide more customers with sustainable product that is affordable for all

 

  • Contributors will get an exclusive opportunity to have first right of discounted bags and apparel made of recycled materials (Recycled plastic bottles and upcycled cotton)

 

  • Our funds will go to providing the perks to each contributor and to provide people in the future with affordable sustainable products!

 

 

The Impact

  • When you contribute you not only are you choosing to use sustainable products but you also reduce the amount of trash that ends up on our landfills and bodies of water.

 

  • We know people are searching for ways to have a positive impact on the environment like we are.  The more funding for this project, the greater the impact we have!
 

Tell your friends about the cause!

story:
The Seat Amigo App

We are Scott, Tim and Taylor. We are three millenials who took our dads idea and made it better. The airline industry has not changed in over 60 years and we shouldn't be forced to sit next a random person. Humans control almost every aspect of their lives, their personalized taxi (Uber) and their hotel room (Airbnb) etc. So why not control who you sit next to on your airline flight? It's time to control your flying experience.

The app is live, check it out at http://app.seatamigo.com

Simply stated, the problem and the solution...
 

 

The app.

Now let's check out the app... (it's live so you can get on it and create a profile at http://app.seatamigo.com)
 


So why would people use the Seat Amigo app?

Let's check out some use cases...
 

 

Who are we?

We're three siblings that decided to make a great app to overcome the 60 yr. old problem of not knowing who will be sitting next to you on your Southwest flight. Seat Amigo is the solution and as we grow, we'll expand to other airlines. We're going to change the way we all fly!

 

What are we asking for and what are we offering you?

We are passionate about changing this part of the travel industry! We took our Dad's idea and made it better. We want to give airline passengers the best possible experience. We believe that we all deserve a better flying experience. Our app and technology is scaleable to many other forms of public transportation and or events/concerts and our aim is to help people connect there too.

We are seeking $25,000 for marketing to get off the ground (pun intended)! Your $40 contribution will earn you a two-year premium membership on Seat Amigo ($120 value). This includes using Seat Amigo for unlimited flights for two years on Southwest Airlines!

Seat Amigo is already changing the way people travel. We are giving passengers control in an area where there historically has not been one. We need your help.

Along with your donation we need you to help spread the word about Seat Amigo. Help us get as many people as possible using the app so that this community can grow and you can be a part of helping change the way people fly.

It is time for a change!

 

The Seat Amigo Team - Scott, Tim and Taylor
story_txt:
The Seat Amigo App
We are Scott, Tim and Taylor. We are three millenials who took our dads idea and made it better. The airline industry has not changed in over 60 years and we shouldn't be forced to sit next a random person. Humans control almost every aspect of their lives, their personalized taxi (Uber) and their hotel room (Airbnb) etc. So why not control who you sit next to on your airline flight? It's time to control your flying experience.
The app is live, check it out at http://app.seatamigo.com
Simply stated, the problem and the solution... 


 

The app.
Now let's check out the app... (it's live so you can get on it and create a profile at http://app.seatamigo.com) 


So why would people use the Seat Amigo app?
Let's check out some use cases... 

 
Who are we?
We're three siblings that decided to make a great app to overcome the 60 yr. old problem of not knowing who will be sitting next to you on your Southwest flight. Seat Amigo is the solution and as we grow, we'll expand to other airlines. We're going to change the way we all fly!

 
What are we asking for and what are we offering you?
We are passionate about changing this part of the travel industry! We took our Dad's idea and made it better. We want to give airline passengers the best possible experience. We believe that we all deserve a better flying experience. Our app and technology is scaleable to many other forms of public transportation and or events/concerts and our aim is to help people connect there too.
We are seeking $25,000 for marketing to get off the ground (pun intended)! Your $40 contribution will earn you a two-year premium membership on Seat Amigo ($120 value). This includes using Seat Amigo for unlimited flights for two years on Southwest Airlines!

Seat Amigo is already changing the way people travel. We are giving passengers control in an area where there historically has not been one. We need your help.
Along with your donation we need you to help spread the word about Seat Amigo. Help us get as many people as possible using the app so that this community can grow and you can be a part of helping change the way people fly.
It is time for a change!
 

The Seat Amigo Team - Scott, Tim and Taylor

story:
It’s about being free, mobile, and carrying just what you need. Protect your phone and more with Angle Bag!

It's Angle Bag! The newest waterproof solution for keeping those items you want to protect safe - both in and out of the water! That's right! You can secure this handy waterproof solution to your body and jump right into the water with the peace of mind knowing that your valuables are secure, safe, and dry.   

Trust Angle Bag's compact and sleek design to keep everything from your keys to your IDs safe while you explore the city, enjoy a night out, and even participate in your favorite water sports!

We all know it can be tough keeping your valuables safe from harm and theft, especially at the beach. Angle Bag's innovative design protects what you need, keeping your items close, safe, and secure. Let Angle Bag protect your items from sand as you walk around the beach, and water when you feel like a swim on a hot summer day. Keep those summer holidays stress free with Angle Bag!

Keep prying eyes off your valuables. Angle Bags textile molding technology doesn't just add to its sleek design and security capabilities - it also adds an extra layer of visual protection to give you complete privacy about what you are carrying. Angle Bag keeps prying eyes away and gives you the confidence to life your life without fear of theft.

Angle Bag’s superb construction ensures that the main compartment stays waterproof! 

This gives you an extra layer of protection for your valuables both in and out of the water!

Angle Bag was designed to store your most valuable items while you enjoy a day at the beach, and excursion into the outdoors, or just enjoy the sights around a city. Its stylish compact design features a vertical access pocket that provides convenient access to your items. 

Just place your phone, keys, wallet, or just any other small valuable into the vertical access pocket and go about your day knowing that your items are protected, safe, and secure with you at all times!

The Smart Organization System lets you carry the most with multiple compartments designed for easy no-fuss access. Angle Bag’s main compartment is perfect for your passport, wallet, keys, jewellery, and more! The Smart Organization System also features additional compartments designed specifically for your phone and other items you want quick access to such as your keys and headphones. 

The Smart Organization System, coupled with Angle Bag’s triangular and compact design makes give it all the storage space you need to keep your items safe, dry, and close to you.

Angle Bag’s innovative 45 degree position gives the wearer minimum resistance and maximum sliding in water.

The one-of-a-kind triangular design ensures trouble-free access to your valuables.

A Full Cushion Support system makes Angle Bag easy to wear for everyday use, giving you the support and comfort you need for any activity!

It’s easy to see how Angle Bag’s unique triangular design is the only option for maximum storage capacity, safety, and support!

The triangular design isn't the only thing that makes Angle Bag the smart choice for security, protection, and comfort. The outer layer of Angle Bag is industrially designed with thermoform flexible materials that adds to its stylish level of protection.

With a stylish appearance and versatility, Angle Bag is must have for any occasion! Wear it comfortably and confidently on a night out with friends, to a party, or as you explore the city.

Angle Bag also makes a fantastic gift for anyone who appreciates safety, quality, versatility, and style!

The Ventiprene Technology in Angle Bag creates channels which allow for heat and sweat from the body to process through the material as water vapor. Built in to Angle Bag as a soft mesh, this quick-drying fabric technology keeps your skin cooler, drier, and more comfortable in hot or humid climates.

Interwoven in a crosshatch pattern throughout Angle Bag is an advanced layer of Ripstop material. This TPU coated lightweight material enhances Angle Bag’s waterproof and rip resistant capabilities.

Trust the revolutionary materials in Angle Bag to give you the Best in breathability, comfort, and protection in any activity that you do!

Versatility is about more than a compact design, sleek look, revolutionary materials, or comfort. Versatility requires that you can take what you need when you need it and be assured the same protection and comfort the entire time.

Angle Bag meets your needs with a fashionable leather case that is classy, durable, and best of all - removable. This handmade glasses case will hold any glasses up to an L size.

Neoprene, the revolutionary technology that allows for additional breathability, is what is used to create Angle Bag’s fully adjustable waist strap. This stretchy material is incredibly durable, lightweight, and resilient to the weathering caused by the elements and repeated use. 

The Double Lock Buckle is designed to be lightweight and firm, guaranteeing you top performance and safety- even in big waves! Even the zipper on Angle Bag is specifically designed for hassle-free and quick-access to your valuables at anytime.

Angle Bag’s versatility and standards are unparalleled on the market. No other bag will offer you the versatility, style, technology, and security that you will get with Angle Bag!

 

When we say anywhere, we mean anywhere! Don’t left fear of theft or damage stop you from living your life! Angle Bag keeps your items safe and secure in any situation! Enjoy the comfort and support as you hike through the mountains or cycle your favorite trail. Be confident that your items will stay dry and protected in water as you surf, swim, dive, or snorkel. Angle Bag is guaranteed to protect your items in water up to 20 feet!

Angle Bag’s level of protection, durability, and comfort won’t keep any thrill seeker from getting the most out of their outdoor adventure. 

Angle Bag is a must have for any traveler who requires the best in safety, support, and versatility!

"We are a team that is passionate about creating great design products. One day during a vacation, we were faced with a problem - out stuff was stolen while we were enjoying a sunny day at the beach. We came back from swimming to find that our phones, keys, wallets, and money were missing! We decided to create beautiful and comfortable bag that keeps your valuables stored, safe, and secure anywhere you want to go. Angle Bag is the answer to a stress free active life!" - Olen Olemas (Creator)

"We took only the most most revolutionary materials and combined them with a stylish and comfortable design. We strive to create quality bags and active gear specifically designed for people who live, work, and play in urban environments. We truly love what we do and put that passion into every project." - Jennifer Downs (Operations)

"Angle Bag started as a design sketch after having our valuable stolen at the beach. We have come a long way from sketches to produce a design that we are confident is top of the line." - Eva Allas (Finance)

Risks and challenges

We work with a manufacturer in China that has a proven track record of producing quality active and casual bags. Their expertise in this process allows for a realistic and efficient timeline for production of the Angle Bag.

We will find reliable logistics partner to ensure that all orders are fulfilled on time and accurately. We are excited to ship AngleBag to customers worldwide and will do our best to make sure that every order is received in a timely manner. Customer Satisfaction is our priority!

story:
"This boat makes sailing so much easier and accessible for everyone."

The 3FOLDBOAT is the first practical solid foldable sailing boat, that

  • is set up in a matter of minutes,
  • allows you to take it on holidays or a weekend out,
  • is next to a sailing boat a practical touring boat and fishing boat,
  • is easy to store on a rack in your garage or in a spare bedroom,
  • and comes at an affordable price.

3FOLDBOAT - enjoy the fun of sailing without all the hassle!

WHY WE DO THIS CAMPAIGN?

Sailing is one of the great adventurous pleasures in life.

We are passionate about sailing, but feel sad to see that so many people lose their interest as a result of all kinds of reasons:

  • high prices
  • storage problems
  • maintenance costs
  • and the need for a trailer to bring it on a holiday or a weekend out

     

"It always amazed me why so few of the people, that do not live near water, sail. So many people that do not live near mountains, love to go skiing or in summertime walk or climb mountains. So I started thinking about making sailing and learning to sail easier." (about Jan)

What we came up with?

We are ever so proud to present to you our revolutionary sailing boat, which we named the 3FOLDBOAT (© TM and 2 patents pending), because you can also use it as a tourboat or a fishing boat. It is a really rigid fibreglass boat when you sail it, but when you're done sailing you can fold it up and put it in a bag.

Our goal is to let more people, kids and adults, enjoy the fun of sailing.

Please share our Indiegogo project and our Youtube Promo Video?

Sailing is in our genes. Don't let it go lost!

If children haven't learned to sail at the age of 14, it is highly unlikely that they will ever learn to sail at all (read Nick Hayes: Saving Sailing). Maybe you never learned to sail and always thought it would be fun? Now, here is your chance!

Don't know how to sail (yet)?

Here is a series of videos to make you familiar with the basics of sailing (and there are many more to watch on YouTube and elsewhere on the net). Try it, it's fun!
Sailing - Basic Maneuvering
Sailing - Wind Direction
Sailing - Tacking and Gybing
Sailing - Upwind Sailing
Sailing - Capsize Recovery
Sailing - Docking and Stopping

And when you feel you are ready for it. Just row your 3FOLDBOAT to the middle of a lake on a nice day, raise the sails and start sailing. It is like learning how to ride a bike. You have to  learn it by doing it! Only with sailing on a nice day you're a lot less likely to hurt yourself and the boat is practically unsinkable!

Four lakes sail trip to the UK.

We hope this campaign keeps us quite occupied this summer, so just before launching it, we went on a short holiday to the UK to sail the 3FOLDBOAT on some of the beautiful lakes in and around the Peak District National Parc.


To watch the full length videos we took on each lake, click the links below. At Rother Valley Lake it was a nice quiet day, perfect for a beginning sailor. It also shows that even with very little wind, the 3FOLDBOAT sails really well!

Dove Stone Reservoir:  https://youtu.be/KVkJWI01Z9I
Rother Valley Lake (calm): https://youtu.be/-Xsh2A5hMTc
Rother Valley Lake (windier): https://youtu.be/YNrDkFnoB-Q
Carsington Water: https://youtu.be/1A9NhQhgvTE
Gorton Reservoirs: https://youtu.be/yKTgDWBIy0A

On this holiday we were just with the two of us. With an earlier prototype we shot some sailing videos with more people on board: https://youtu.be/JTMTKkviVjo

And setting it up takes just a few  minutes.

See here for yourself how easy and fast it is to set up the 3FOLDBOAT:

For the realtime assembly video click here.

Why we need your help?

Developing the 3FOLDBOAT pretty much exhausted all our financial resources. We know now how to build it, but really need your help to take it to the next level.

Secondly, to buy everything necessary and build one boat at the time is much, much more costly and time consuming than building 5 or 10 or more in one go. So to make the 3FOLDBOAT available to you at an attractive price, we really need to scale up the production.

Thirdly, you may notice some imperfections at the boat in the photos and videos. The boat shown is our fourth prototype boat and still has undergone changes to make it more perfect and also, all the parts are handsawn and handcut. Your investment will be used to buy professional precision laser cutting equipment for the fibreglass plates, automated welding machines for the fabric and an automated injection moulding system for the fibreglass boxes and benches, so that we can deliver you a 3FOLDBOAT that is of the best possible quality as well as perfectly looking.

Can we do the manufacturing?

Building the boats is very labour intensive. But it is not rocket science or making a complicated electronic device. So yes, we are absolutely sure we will live up to our promise. And if your response is bigger than our initial goal, we will just need to work harder and get more hands involved.
Initially, we strive to scale up the production stepwise, first to 10 and then to 25 boats per week and if necessary, even further to the level needed to fulfill all orders within 8 to 10 months.

Shipping

Finished boats will be shipped to you in the order in which we received your funding. We expect to ship the first before the end of the year. 
For shipping within Europe and to the US add $ 180,-. As soon as we have some volume to sent, we will negotiate you the best possible price  for shipping outside Europe and the US. For Australia or New Sealand we expect you would have to add an additional $100,- or $150,-

We are serious about quality!

Every boat that we send out into the world represents an opportunity for us to attract more customers. So we will do everything to maintain our quality at the highest possible level. All the materials used to manufacture the boat are from Dutch and German suppliers.

                      

Certified by the Dutch Certification Institute!

The finished 3FOLDBOAT, and the materials used, have undergone a rigorous certification procedure, and meet all the internationally required criteria.
Every 3FOLDBOAT that we ship comes with a certificate of international approval  issued by the DCI (Dutch Certification Institute) and a registration number registered by the HISWA (Dutch Watersports Association).

Serial numbers

The certification procedure requires that each boat has a unique serial number for official registration purposes. Next to the positions determined by the authorities, the manufacturer has 4 positions to give each boat a unique number. We will start numbering from 0101 and the numbers will reflect the order in which we received your funding. This number will appear on a small plate in the boat as well as in the sails. So, if you sail a 3FOLDBOAT with a low number in the sails next year, it shows you were one of our early supporters!

Colors

If we receive funding to produce 200 boats, we can make them available in 2 additional colors, "gray" and "sand yellow". If we receive funding to produce 500 boats, we can make them available in 5 additional colors, next to the "gray" and "sand yellow", these colors are "blue", "light blue" and "green" (for the fisherman amongst you). If you wish your 3FOLDBOAT in another color than the standard white, let us know which of the 5 colors you prefer and if we reach these targets we will produce your boat in the specified color. If we don't reach these targets, we will send you the standard white color 3FOLDBOAT. For a color impression, see below.

2GoOPTIMIST

Although the 3FOLDBOAT is perfect for children that already know how to sail or adults who want to learn sailing themselves, it is too big for very young children to learn to sail by themselves. This is why this coming winter, we will also develop a smaller 'Optimist-like' sailing boat, named the 2GoOPTIMIST, using the same patented technology.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Will the 3FOLDBOAT sail properly?
The basic design of the 3FOLDBOAT is that of the well known Mirror Dinghy. We didn't want to invent a new boat, we just wanted to turn an already good sailing boat into a more practical one, without loosing it's sailing characteritics. And for the changes we made, we obtained the approval of the DCI! With more than 70.000 Mirror Dinghy's built worlwide, many experienced sailors and world champion sailers of today started to sail in a Mirror Dinghy. So we can assure you, you're 3FOLDBOAT will sail.

What if I don't know how to sail?
If you think you like sailing, and we can assure you it is good fun and a great way to reduce stress, the 3FOLDBOAT is ideal for you. Just row it to the middle of a lake on a nice day, raise the sails and start sailing. It is like learning how to ride a bike, you can only learn it by doing it, only with sailing on a nice day you're a lot less likely to hurt yourself and the boat is unsinkable. In our opinion, you either love sailing or you never sailed!

What if I do not live near water?
The 3FOLDBOAT is easy to transport on the roofrack of a car or even in the car if it's a big one. You can take it with you on your holidays or a weekend out or you could even go sailing on a nice summer evening after a busy day!

What when I live in an apartment builing or a small house?
For people that have not much space, the 3FOLDBOAT is the ideal boat. You can put it against a wall on shelf brackets or even place it vertical in a corner of a spare bedroom.

We own a big boat. Should we consider bringing a 3FOLDBOAT?
If you have a 3FOLDBOAT on board, you can use it to access the narrow and shallow waters that are inaccessible for big boats, either with the mast and sails up or with a light electric motor. The 3FOLDBOAT is also ideal for fishing!


OUR PERK OPTIONS

Next to the positions determined by the authorities, the manufacturer has 4 positions to give each boat a unique number. We will start numbering from 0101 and the numbers will reflect the order in which we received your funding. This number will appear on a small plate in the boat as well as in the sails. So, if you sail a 3FOLDBOAT with a low number in the sails next year, it shows you were one of our early supporters!ColorsIf we receive funding to produce 200 boats, we can make them available in 2 additional colors, "gray" and "sand yellow". If we receive funding to produce 500 boats, we can make them available in 5 additional colors, next to the "gray" and "sand yellow", these colors are "blue", "light blue" and "green" (for the fisherman amongst you). If you wish your 3FOLDBOAT in another color than the standard white, let us know which of the 5 colors you prefer and if we reach these targets we will produce your boat in the specified color. If we don't reach these targets, we will send you the standard white color 3FOLDBOAT. For a color impression, see below.2GoOPTIMISTAlthough the 3FOLDBOAT is perfect for children that already know how to sail or adults who want to learn sailing themselves, it is too big for very young children to learn to sail by themselves. This is why this coming winter, we will also develop a smaller 'Optimist-like' sailing boat, named the 2GoOPTIMIST, using the same patented technology.
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
Will the 3FOLDBOAT sail properly?
The basic design of the 3FOLDBOAT is that of the well known Mirror Dinghy. We didn't want to invent a new boat, we just wanted to turn an already good sailing boat into a more practical one, without loosing it's sailing characteritics. And for the changes we made, we obtained the approval of the DCI! With more than 70.000 Mirror Dinghy's built worlwide, many experienced sailors and world champion sailers of today started to sail in a Mirror Dinghy. So we can assure you, you're 3FOLDBOAT will sail.What if I don't know how to sail? If you think you like sailing, and we can assure you it is good fun and a great way to reduce stress, the 3FOLDBOAT is ideal for you. Just row it to the middle of a lake on a nice day, raise the sails and start sailing. It is like learning how to ride a bike, you can only learn it by doing it, only with sailing on a nice day you're a lot less likely to hurt yourself and the boat is unsinkable. In our opinion, you either love sailing or you never sailed!
What if I do not live near water?
The 3FOLDBOAT is easy to transport on the roofrack of a car or even in the car if it's a big one. You can take it with you on your holidays or a weekend out or you could even go sailing on a nice summer evening after a busy day!
What when I live in an apartment builing or a small house?
For people that have not much space, the 3FOLDBOAT is the ideal boat. You can put it against a wall on shelf brackets or even place it vertical in a corner of a spare bedroom.
We own a big boat. Should we consider bringing a 3FOLDBOAT? If you have a 3FOLDBOAT on board, you can use it to access the narrow and shallow waters that are inaccessible for big boats, either with the mast and sails up or with a light electric motor. The 3FOLDBOAT is also ideal for fishing!
OUR PERK OPTIONS
